Content: Double Six beach is pretty close to Seminyak beach, so visit to both beaches can be clubbed. It is a nice, neat and clean beach with several options and activities to do.
review: double six pretty close seminyak visit beach club nice neat clean several option activity

Content: After you fight your way through the café, bar chairs & beer sellers eskys that clog up every entrance & access point, you arrive at a beach that is just like all beaches in the area, overpopulated. You are much better off going to one of the many other glorious beaches on this island that is away from the tourist hotspots
review: fight way café bar chair beer seller eskys clog every entrance access point arrive beach area overpopulate much good go one many glorious beach island away tourist hotspot

Content: A happening beach...many good beach shacks...surfing...the main road leading to the beach is lined by shops selling all varieties of stuffs.Clean in August when we went.

Content: Great place for seeing beautiful sunsets while sipping a beer.  However, would recommend paying a bit extra and going to one of the rooftop bars for two main reasons 1) the beach was filthy - cans, bottles, plastic bags, rotting food, etc etc was littered all along the beach and presumably it all gets washed into the sea at high tide, and 2) very noisy beach bars as they set up large speakers on the beach that blare out music at full volume.
review: great place see beautiful sunset sip beer recommend pay bit extra go one rooftop bar two main reason 1 filthy can bottle plastic bag rot food etc etc litter along presumably get wash sea high tide 2 noisy bar set large speaker blare music full volume

Content: During low tide there are lots of plastic everywhere until it's cleaned away. There is a cleaning crew, but in November there is a lot of debris after high tide.The beach is not for swimmers, more for surfers. It is at it's best at sunset when you can watch the sun go down and chill while listening to live music. Definitely not optimal for kids.
review: low tide lot plastic everywhere clean away clean crew november lot debris high tidethe swimmer surfer best sunset watch sun go chill listen live music definitely optimal kid

Content: This time of the year is definitely a no go for beach lovers. Huge amounts of plastic and other trash plus stinking rivers. Horrible!

Content: A good place for Surfer, when you need beginner lessons.  The beach is the most time clean, but after a rainy day is it dirty on the beach.

Content: Not a bad beach for surfing yet also a safe beach for little kids as the waves break out a bit.  Sand not white but plenty of beach lazy boys to rent if you want.

Content: No use complaining about bali beaches. Unless they are in front of an expensive beachside hotel they will be messy - and even then might still be messy. But you go there for the ability to sit on the beach in warm sunny weather and be served cheap cold beer delivered to you while reclining on a chair or bean bag also provided. All in all it is a relaxing and cheap  break. This beach is possibly a bit better than many and with the new wall being built  perhaps filters out some of the mess when viewed from hotels ?
review: use complain bali beach unless front expensive beachside hotel will messy even might still messy go ability sit warm sunny weather serve cheap cold beer deliver recline chair bean bag provide relax cheap break possibly bit well many new wall build perhaps filter mess view hotel

Content: We found the sea water so dirty its not that healthy to surf here Bali needs to clean things because tourists don't like it.
review: find sea water dirty healthy surf bali need clean thing tourist dont

Content: This beach is north of Kuta beach and can be easily accessed from Legian street, past Legian and close to Seminyak. Or just walk up the beach from Kuta. It will take you about 30 minutes or so. Nice sunsets. Plenty of beach chairs to hire.
review: north kuta easily access legian street past legian close seminyak walk kuta will take 30 minute nice sunset plenty chair hire

Content: Great spot to learn or to hone your surf skills. Plenty of other things to do here like body surf, swim, catch a suntan, fly a kite, enjoy a bintang, have a massage, buy some goodies, have a decent lunch and watch a wonderful sunset.
review: great spot learn hone surf skill plenty thing body surf swim catch suntan fly kite enjoy bintang massage buy goody decent lunch watch wonderful sunset

Content: one of beach along kuta beach area exactly front of double six hotel at arjuna street.You can enjoy atmosfer charming place with seat on the sofa on the white sands with a botle cold beer and if need food..many pub n bar behind your sofabest time at sunset time...amazing
review: one along kuta area exactly front double six hotel arjuna streetyou enjoy atmosfer charm place seat sofa white sand botle cold beer need foodmany pub n bar behind sofabest time sunset timeamazing

Content: Great place to take in the stunning Bali sunset.  Enjoy good food, beverages and live music whilst relaxing in a bean bag on the sand.
review: great place take stunning bali sunset enjoy good food beverage live music whilst relax bean bag sand

Content: Double six beach has restaurants and bars on the beach front itself. There is more going on than compared to beaches in Kuta or Legian, although just as busy. I would definitely recommend checking it out even if you have to make the trip from Kuta. Just make sure you come for sunset.
review: double six restaurant bar front go compare beach kuta legian although busy definitely recommend check even make trip kuta make sure come sunset

Content: Bali pamper us with many choice of good beached and this one is one of the best . The favorite time to come here is during sunset time between 6 to 7 pm . It could be crowded yet vibrant and live . Enjoy the bakso with teh botol, cost you less than 30K and enjoy the sunset view if 1 Million  USD
review: bali pamper u many choice good beach one one best favorite time come sunset time 6 7 pm crowd yet vibrant live enjoy bakso teh botol cost less 30k enjoy sunset view 1 million usd

Content: Not the nicest beach in Bali. Lots of litter and lots of touts trying to sell fake goods. Spoils what could be a nice beach
review: nice bali lot litter lot tout try sell fake good spoil nice

Content: By day the beach is nice not crowded and good to learn how to surf, at sunset there’s four beach bars B9B is my favourite food good and the Bintang cold with bean bags to listen to the duos playing laid back songs...
review: day nice crowd good learn surf sunset there four bar b9b favourite food good bintang cold bean bag listen duos playing lay back song

Content: Had dinner with friends further up the beach then walked Wong the 66' beach with all the wonderful restaurants sat on the bean bags in the sand listening to the waves chatting quietly with a nice liquor to finish off the night so peaceful and relaxing   I so love Bali
review: dinner friend walk wong 66 wonderful restaurant sit bean bag sand listen wave chat quietly nice liquor finish night peaceful relax love bali

Content: A quiet walk on the beach you dodge the rubbish and look out for broken glass. Lovely sunsets, nice restaurants.

Content: Such a beautiful setting for a sunset drink or whatever you please. Plenty of beanbags to lay around on and just watch the world go by
review: beautiful set sunset drink whatever please plenty beanbag lay around watch world go

Content: This is a little hideaway a beach for everyone...Once you find this you will return for it's splendour,clean sand, amenities and the usual Balinese welcoming! it is situated in an ideal position and easy to get to as u stroll down to the Double Six Beach with its charming coffee & tourist shops. Fronting the beach is a fine selection of foods for every taste from take away, casual or fine dining... IT's A MUST...........
review: little hideaway everyoneonce find will return splendourclean sand amenity usual balinese welcoming situate ideal position easy u stroll double six charm coffee tourist shop front fine selection food every taste take away casual fine dining must

Content: Fantastic sandy beach served by lots of restaurants on the beach....the perfect place to lay and sunbathe the world away
review: fantastic sandy serve lots restaurant beachthe perfect place lay sunbathe world away

Content: nice view , good for relax or chit chat while you can drink beer.Good beach for expert surfer.. you should go to this beach when you visit bali.
review: nice view good relax chit chat drink beergood expert surfer go visit bali

Content: located in walking distance to the hotel mariott, it is a very happening beach with music bands playing on the clean sands.
review: locate walk distance hotel mariott happen music band play clean sand

Content: Enjoying sunset with colorful parasol along with live music from local band. You need to buy drink + snack so you can sit on the bean sack chair.
review: enjoy sunset colorful parasol along live music local band need buy drink snack sit bean sack chair

Content: This beach has enough & more options for shacks & beach chairs. You can sit here for hours & watch all the activity happening around you. The water isn't too cold; so you can opt for a dip.However, the beach needs to be more clean. We saw of stream of black water coming from inland & getting released into the sea. Not good!
review: enough option shack chair sit hour watch activity happen around water isnt cold opt diphowever need clean saw stream black water come inland get release sea good

Content: breathtaking to watch the  surf rise up  for miles in each direction.   the  sand floor was  flat for  hundreds of meters out  so there was no  undertow  in many spots.   great for  body surfing  or sitting  meditating upon the  ocean waves.  fun to watch the  surfers doing tricks.
review: breathtaking watch surf rise mile direction sand floor flat hundred meter undertow many spot great body surf sit meditate upon ocean wave fun watch surfer trick

Content: Loved the beach and again the locals are very friendly and kind, went to a couple of the beach huts for the deck chairs and a few beers, lots of wind surfers and lovely Australians, can watch them surf for hours,
review: love local friendly kind go couple hut deck chair beer lot wind surfer lovely australians watch surf hour

Content: I always appreciate the comfortable water temperature, being  able to walk in wasily for a swim. Double Six has the wonderful bean bag bars later in the afternoon- walk arou d until you find music that suits your tastes and check out the differing prices for drinks and food as they vary greatly. The beach here  was clean. Walking further south to Legian showed disgusting rubbish on the waterline and sand. What a pity that the huge beach front resorts do not employ locald to keep the beach clean: the hotels make a huge amount of money from these beaches but obviously take no repsonsibility for their upkeep. Kudos to Kuta and Seminyak for taking time to enssure that their lives beaches are cleaned.
review: always appreciate comfortable water temperature able walk wasily swim double six wonderful bean bag bar later afternoon walk arou d find music suit taste check differ price drink food vary greatly clean walk south legian show disgust rubbish waterline sand pity huge front resort employ locald keep clean hotel make huge amount money beach obviously take repsonsibility upkeep kudos kuta seminyak take time enssure live beach clean

Content: Disgustingly dirty beach like all the beaches nearby. Would not spent time there yet alone swim. Full of trash. Was bad 7 years ago when we first visited, even worse now.
review: disgustingly dirty beach nearby spend time yet alone swim full trash bad 7 year ago first visit even bad now

Content: lovely spot to watch sunset, the guy in charge came to me when i sat on the beach bench, and asked for how long i'll be there, the rent was IDR300,000/hours.. and I said "i'll be there only until 6PM (around 2 hours) so, how much?" then the guy said, "i'll give u 150 then".. i was like "???" with a cool face.. but then it's a deal! hahaha.. ^oo^ ,  i enjoy the beach (even if i lost my glasses by a big wave hit).
review: lovely spot watch sunset guy charge come sat bench ask long ill rent idr300000hours say ill 6pm around 2 hour much guy say ill give u 150 cool face deal hahaha oo enjoy even lose glass big wave hit

Content: I love this beach just you can learn to surf or just enjoy the waves or just watch the amazing sunset.just keep away from the red flags (CAREFUL THE UNDERCURRENT)
review: love learn surf enjoy wave watch amaze sunsetjust keep away red flag careful undercurrent

Content: Great little spot. Relax on a beanbag with a cocktail and enjoy the sunset. Live music and fireworks the night we were there.
review: great little spot relax beanbag cocktail enjoy sunset live music firework night

Content: Got dropped off by a taxi in the main car park. Could only access the beach in little alleys/certain areas due to all the construction and walls. A few tired and dirty restaurants line what access you do have, and you constantly get harassed by guys offering transport of scooters. Wouldn't waste time going here. I was very disappointed.
review: get drop taxi main car park access little alleyscertain area due construction wall tire dirty restaurant line access constantly harass guy offer transport scooter wouldnt waste time go disappointed

Content: Very popular with surfers and body boarders. Not a beach where you can swim but wave jumping is great. All ameninities are available on the beach
review: popular surfer body boarder swim wave jump great ameninities available

Content: The beach is very flat and also very clean with dark brown sand. Lots of water sports available, as well as hire of day beds, beanbags etc. good atmosphere with a lot of people around. Also a lot of locals trying to sell merchandise.
review: flat clean dark brown sand lot water sport available well hire day bed beanbags etc good atmosphere lot people around lot local try sell merchandise

Content: The first thing my husband and I wanted to experience was a beach walk along Double Six Beach.At first, it seemed pleasant enough until you came across the flow of brown water eminating from a number of areas into the sea.The smell was nauseating and made us want to rush back to the hotel. So disappointing, considering Bali depends on it's Tourism market. The Bali authorities need to fix this as a matter of urgency. It could be wonderful but it clearly isn't!
review: first thing husband want experience walk along double six beachat first seem pleasant enough come across flow brown water eminating number area seathe smell nauseate make u want rush back hotel disappoint consider bali depends tourism market bali authority need fix matter urgency wonderful clearly isnt

Content: We started our travels in Seminyak before going onto other areas of Bali and other islands in Indonesia. The was my least favourite beach as it was more like dirt than sand and actually smelt like bad dog breath. Much nicer beaches in Indonesia! Would recommend the Gili Islands if you like perfect beaches.
review: start travel seminyak go onto area bali island indonesia least favourite dirt sand actually smelt bad dog breath much nicer beach indonesia recommend gili island perfect beach

Content: Great bars and excellent place to watch sunset . Hire a beach chair and umbrella and enjoy a beer or cocktail.
review: great bar excellent place watch sunset hire chair umbrella enjoy beer cocktail

Content: Very cool atmosphere at night. Several beach bars playing live music on the sand. Lots of people walking around. Several surf schools open during the day. Beach is cleaned each morning. Can walk for ever. Great people watching.
review: cool atmosphere night several bar play live music sand lot people walk around several surf school open day clean morning walk great people watch

Content: Lots of beach vendors who would come around to offer their goods for sale. Beach is alway crowded with people who wants to get a fast bucks from you. Lots of beach sun deck for suntanning session
review: lot vendor come around offer good sale alway crowd people want fast buck lot sun deck suntanning session

Content: One of my fav beaches! We were there two times during our 8 days trip. Chill out to catch sunset with a bottle of tea sosro and a bowl of bakso. Yummy! We were staying in Legian during our last days in Bali but we don’t mind travelling all the way here as we prefers this beach than Kuta!
review: one fav beach two time 8 day trip chill catch sunset bottle tea sosro bowl bakso yummy stay legian last day bali dont mind travel way prefers kuta

Content: Went there for an afternoon lunch and drink, great place near the pool, recommend the tempura prawns. Service was great. Lovely bathrooms
review: go afternoon lunch drink great place near pool recommend tempura prawn service great lovely bathroom

Content: We actually visited sept 2016 but can't go back that far. The beach was kept really clean, there were lifeguards which, unfortunately, my teens had to be aided by.l as they were nearly swept out in a strong rip. Beach hawkers were plentiful and a bit pushy but it was all stuff we were interested in. Daughters got their braids done for $15 for long hair which was way cheaper than anywhere else and, in my opinion, more memorable for them. We had pedicures and bought souvenirs. Rented a tent but was charged the full day price even though he cleared up an hour after we arrived at 3.30pm. He just laughed at me and said, per hour price so be clear! We didn't get upset, it's one of those things! One night we had dinner st the beach and it was a magical experience. We sat on bean bags around the table as the sun set and the musicians set up. We danced, laughed, talked and ate. Seven of us and it cost around $70 AUD. we didn't let the kids swim at night of course. Renting surfboards was easy, arranging surf lessons was easy. Everyone is geared up for Aussie families. Plenty of pubs around the place. Good cheap breakfasts.
review: actually visit sept 2016 cant go back far keep really clean lifeguard unfortunately teens aided byl nearly sweep strong rip hawker plentiful bit pushy stuff interested daughter get braid do 15 long hair way cheap anywhere opinion memorable pedicure buy souvenir rent tent charge full day price even though cleared hour arrive 330pm laugh say per hour price clear didnt upset one thing one night dinner st magical experience sit bean bag around table sun set musician set dance laughed talked ate seven u cost around 70 aud didnt let kid swim night course rent surfboard easy arrange surf lesson easy everyone gear aussie family plenty pub around place good cheap breakfast

Content: Nice stretch of beach. Sand is definitely one of the softest I have ever walked on (no shells or rocks to be seen). Definitely more of a place for surfing than going in for a swim. There are signs that say you can't go in for a swim, but of course we went in for a dip when it was too hot. Having said that, I nearly got hit by a surf board when a big wave came crashing and the girl with the surfboard lost control. So be vigilant!Sunbeds are expensive. For 2 sunbeds and a parasol it was 200,000 idr and we tried to haggle with the man to no avail. The next day we went elsewhere and we were able to get 2 bed ands a parasol for 150,000 after haggling (though the beds weren't as comfy).There is also wifi on the beach if you stay by the central area- great!
review: nice stretch sand definitely one soft walk shell rock see definitely place surf go swim sign say cant go swim course go dip hot say nearly get hit surf board big wave come crash girl surfboard lose control vigilantsunbeds expensive 2 sunbeds parasol 200000 idr try haggle man avail next day go elsewhere able 2 bed ands parasol 150000 haggle though bed werent comfythere wifi stay central area great

Content: A little south on Double Six are the umbrella bars on the sand. They are a great place to watch the sunset and are a lot more basic and chilled then the bigger beach bars.
review: little south double six umbrella bar sand great place watch sunset lot basic chill big bar

Content: An amazing very long stretch of beach. Beautiful sunsets lots of beach restaurants. Sand clean but water very murky and we saw and smelt sewage flowing into the sea from stream run offs.
review: amaze long stretch beautiful sunset lots restaurant sand clean water murky saw smelt sewage flow sea stream run offs

Content: This is an extension to the south of Seminyak beach and suffers in my opinion from over development. Too many sun beds etc on the beach and too many water sports vendors. I realise that these things are there for tourism but perhaps the balance has been lost or perhaps it is simply not what I am looking for. However there are many better beaches elsewhere
review: extension south seminyak suffers opinion development many sun bed etc many water sport vendor realise thing tourism perhaps balance lose perhaps simply look many good beach elsewhere

Content: we stoped in for a drink. Cost us $34 for 2 coctails. we wont bother with thos place again. Also drinks are very small. No great vibe either
review: stop drink cost u 34 2 coctails wont bother thos place drink small great vibe either

Content: Double Six beach is the perfect place for beginners to learn surfing. The waves are not too big, there are a few instructors on the beach and it's not too crowded (like Kuta)
review: double six perfect place beginner learn surf wave big instructor crowd kuta

Content: Lots of fun, great teachers who will have you up in no time.Facilities to lock your belongings away, towel is provided, photos at the end of the class to review. Just do it!
review: lot fun great teacher will timefacilities lock belonging away towel provide photos end class review

Content: Alot of construction and remodeling along the road front but what you get once you reach the beach is worth it, friendly locals all competing to make your stay memorable. during our stay in Bali we visited the beach on several afternoons for the sunset we chose different bars and and sections of the beach, We definitely recommend you spend at least one afternoon relaxing and enjoying sunset on Double Six Beach
review: alot construction remodel along road front reach worth friendly local compete make stay memorable stay bali visit several afternoon sunset chose different bar section definitely recommend spend least one afternoon relax enjoy sunset double six

Content: Nice beach front.. has an open air club with great selection of music (wont miss its location as it visible and loud)You have lots of restaurants selection, however many of them were under renovation and part of the beach was locked. Most annoying thing is the massive amount of scooters running in the narrow beach walk lane. Riders are very comfortable riding in that narrow area in a two way direction which you have to dance to avoid getting hit by one.
review: nice front open air club great selection music wont miss location visible loudyou lot restaurant selection many renovation part lock annoy thing massive amount scooter run narrow walk lane rider comfortable rid narrow area two way direction dance avoid get hit one

Content: stayed at the double six, and they have a beach club area over the road for guests. nice area that has full service and charge back o room.
review: stay double six club area road guest nice area full service charge back o room

Content: Quite sad to look at, the road along the beach is filthy and covered in construction works and barricades. Beach itsself is not that good, far better ones anywhere in Australia and many other places in the world.   Yes, you can sit in a bean bag and drink and watch the sunset, with a passing parade of predominately heavily inked Australians promenading up and down in their Bintang singlets with a bottle in their hand.  Jalan Arjuna (Double 6 road) itself has some nice little shops and a couple of good places to eat, but far better beaches elsewhere.
review: quite sad look road along filthy covered construction work barricade itsself good far good one anywhere australia many place world yes sit bean bag drink watch sunset pass parade predominately heavily inked australian promenade bintang singlet bottle hand jalan arjuna double 6 road nice little shops couple good place eat far good beach elsewhere

Content: Our hotel was a short stroll away from Double Six Beach. We spent many hours relaxing in the bean chairs sipping on a Bintang watching the sunset. Each bar has live music each night and they all fill up prior to the sun setting. The beach itself is a nice beach and great for swimming. Enjoyed our time there.
review: hotel short stroll away double six spend many hour relax bean chair sip bintang watch sunset bar live music night fill prior sun set nice great swim enjoyed time

Content: the beach was nice and well worth the walk / visit.  we laid out and had some coconut water and mixed drinks.  The beach is very dirty and there are no garbage cans around, so you need to be careful where you step, but still very nice and worth the visit!
review: nice well worth walk visit lay coconut water mixed drink dirty garbage can around need careful step still nice worth visit

Content: Gotta love this spot. Its pretty amazing what they pull together in 30mins. . . and  dont miss the sunset whatever you do.
review: gotta love spot pretty amazing pull together 30mins dont miss sunset whatever

Content: Beach is clean , no rubbish scattered everywhere near the ocean except the construction on going , also some locals trying to sell handcrafts etc . Good for surfing and sunbathing for sure , other than that nothing much to expect .
review: clean rubbish scatter everywhere near ocean except construction go local try sell handcraft etc good surf sunbathing sure nothing much expect

Content: Having drinks while watching the sunset was a highlight. It was a lovely setup with live music. Would easily go back again!
review: drink watch sunset highlight lovely setup live music easily go back

Content: Great evening we had a beautiful sunset and a drink and snacks in a bean bag on the beach for $20 Australian
review: great even beautiful sunset drink snack bean bag 20 australian

Content: Nice sand, decent waves, close restaurants and all the easy amenities to make a day at the beach care free and relaxing.
review: nice sand decent wave close restaurant easy amenity make day care free relaxing

Content: Beautiful restaurant for watching the sunset.  We had tapas and cocktails very enjoyable, prices are over priced which is a shame, as they have music dancing later on in the evening, which is nice, but as i mentioned too expensive!!!! Waitresses are very helpful but they really do push hard for u to keep ordering.
review: beautiful restaurant watch sunset tapa cocktail enjoyable price price shame music dancing later even nice mention expensive waitress helpful really push hard u keep order

Content: A beach, just opposite cocoons, a well known venue for the young and the beautiful unfortunately the beach itself has a long dirty drain, running from thr drarnpipe on thr road, and tricklesright down to the beach . Once you have bipassed this area , the beach is beautiful. Come last in the afternoon, Pick out a bean bag chair, and while away the afternoon, whatching the locals play, soccer on the beach, while you settle in with a cocktail. Bliss.
review: opposite cocoon well know venue young beautiful unfortunately long dirty drain run thr drarnpipe thr road tricklesright bipassed area beautiful come last afternoon pick bean bag chair away afternoon whatching local play soccer settle cocktail bliss

Content: This is a nice beach with soft sand but it get's really crowded. My family found that if you travel another 800 metres north it gets less busy and the beach gets wider. You have a more relaxed time.
review: nice soft sand get really crowd family find travel another 800 metre north get less busy get wide relaxed time

Content: This beach is great for everything - learning how to surf, sunbathing during the day, but we really liked coming to one of the many beach bars to chill out with a drink and watch the skies, or our nightly beach walks. The beach is so long, you can walk as far as you can, away from the noise for some quiet, before heading back to the live music. Really great.
review: great everything learn surf sunbathe day really like come one many bar chill drink watch sky nightly walk long walk far away noise quiet head back live music really great

Content: Great atmosphere on this beach. Sunsets are beautiful. The swimming can be dangerous because of high waves but fun to play in the shallow areas
review: great atmosphere sunset beautiful swim dangerous high wave fun play shallow area

Content: This beach is very famous, my wife want to go very much. We came during school holiday season. Even though beach was very beautiful, it was too many people, cannot full relax.
review: famous wife want go much come school holiday season even though beautiful many people full relax

Content: We love that beach which is so beautiful. The beach is so wider and the weather is so nice. that monment before the sunset I will remember it for ever.
review: love beautiful wider weather nice monment sunset will remember

Content: The best place for beginner surfers, and those who enjoy a good sunset. It's a long stretch so it isn't overly crowded.
review: best place beginner surfer enjoy good sunset long stretch isnt overly crowd

Content: Great place to enjoy sunset, get there about 4.30 and pick your bar/bean bag, soak up the live music, people watch and generally enjoy !
review: great place enjoy sunset 430 pick barbean bag soak live music people watch generally enjoy

Content: There are a lot of surfers here otherwise the beach is not overly busy. It is a great spot for beginner surfers.
review: lot surfer overly busy great spot beginner surfer

Content: This beach is perfect if you are a surfer - big waves, lots of surf classes for beginners. However the waves and current are too strong for swimming , so not really suitable for a relaxing day on a beach as you won't be able to get into water (at least during the days when we were there) . Another good time for visiting is sunset time. Amazing! Lots of bars to enjoy the sunset while having a drink/dinner.
review: perfect surfer big wave lot surf class beginner wave current strong swimming really suitable relax day wont able water least day another good time visit sunset time amaze lot bar enjoy sunset drinkdinner

Content: We visited it during low tide so the ocean was very calm and we could have a nice swim. The place is really nice for sunset, even though the restaurants on the beach play music after 5.30 so if you want a quiet sunset you should choose another place. You can find sun beds in this area, but you should definitely bargain with the keepers as they charge you a lot if they see you are foreigner.
review: visit low tide ocean calm nice swim place really nice sunset even though restaurant play music 530 want quiet sunset choose another place find sun bed area definitely bargain keeper charge lot see foreigner

Content: We walked down here as we were staying about 6 or 7 km up the beach. The waves were perfect for surfing. My husband surfed for about 2 and a half hours and I watched and bought some bracelets. The lady sat next to me and handmade the bracelets for me.There was a man selling a crossbow but we didn't buy it as I wasn't sure what airport security would think. Ha ha. And I'm not sure we'd have much use for it.Great surfing. Nice beach.
review: walk stay 6 7 km wave perfect surf husband surf 2 half hour watch bought bracelet lady sit next handmade bracelet methere man sell crossbow didnt buy wasnt sure airport security think ha ha im sure wed much use itgreat surf nice

Content: The beach has high waves, which make it good exclusively for surfers, it is forbidden to swim as the waves are quit high.There are some very nice coffee shops and restaurants if you just want to chill out!
review: high wave make good exclusively surfer forbid swim wave quit highthere nice coffee shop restaurant want chill

Content: I've been in Legian for the last 8 days and have been to the beach everyday. It's a great part of the beach and usually not as many rips as other areas. It's very relaxing to be on a lounge and have the option to be served anything you may desire. It's always good to watch the great surfers and also all the surf schools teaching new ones. It's very easy to join a surf school or simply hire a board and get lessons direct from the hirer. Great part of the beach to be on all day and also stay or come back for a few drinks and sunset.
review: ive legian last 8 day everyday great part usually many rip area relax lounge option serve anything may desire always good watch great surfer surf school teach new one easy join surf school simply hire board lesson direct hirer great part day stay come back drink sunset

Content: Capil Beach is a long beach in Seminyak, beside Double Six Beach. Very wide with the low tide. Mostly with sunbeds,  it's quite a touristic spot.  It'd be beautiful if it was cleaner. Surf schools, bars and restaurants.Parking can be a nightmare if you drive a car.  No problem with a motorbike.
review: capil long seminyak beside double six wide low tide mostly sunbeds quite touristic spot itd beautiful clean surf school bar restaurantsparking nightmare drive car problem motorbike

Content: This beach is very crowded even on weekdays. It has a very wide and long sloping beach so it's good to bring your dogs or kids to play. Many food stalls but mostly sell local food but you can find a good pop up cafe on the west side of the beach to chill out with cocktails or softdrinks.
review: crowd even weekday wide long slop good bring dog kid play many food stall mostly sell local food find good pop cafe west side chill cocktails softdrinks

Content: you need to rent a bed always need to ask for low price they told me first 120 and then i get it on 80 rupiah
review: need rent bed always need ask low price tell first 120 80 rupiah

Content: My partner and I visited the beach as I had read that it was ideal for surfing. Having never surfed before I thought I should have a go. I haggled with the guys to secure a good deal for the sunbeds and surfboard.... so I paid 100,000 IDR for two beds and a surfboard. After having a go with the surfboard and finding it tricky the guy gladly swap it for a body board (not before chuckling to himself)
review: partner visit read ideal surf never surf think go haggled guy secure good deal sunbeds surfboard pay 100000 idr two bed surfboard go surfboard find tricky guy gladly swap body board chuckle

Content: Many beach shacks in the area,all alive & with live bands in the evenings. Our hotel had a beach club here too. Many shacks renting/selling surfing boards & related stuff. Many hawkers selling stuff too.The road leading to d beach had sooo many shops selling Ato Z , restaurants, massage centres,parlours...
review: many shack areaall alive live band evenings hotel club many shack rentingselling surfing board relate stuff many hawker sell stuff toothe road lead d sooo many shop sell ato z restaurant massage centresparlours

Content: We thoroughly enjoyed our 4 night stay at the Double Six. We paid close to $3500 AUD for our stray and found our time there enjoyable. Our room was the ocean facing and the views were excellent. The Plantation restaurant was incredible and the balcony booths we reserved for the night ensured excellent views while we dined. Highly recommend.
review: thoroughly enjoy 4 night stay double six pay close 3500 aud stray find time enjoyable room ocean face view excellent plantation restaurant incredible balcony booth reserve night ensure excellent view din highly recommend

Content: This beach not that great for swimming or just chilling in the water, but there are surfing lessons and other tourist trappings available. The best feature is the sunset views. Sunsets here can be amazing. It worth renting a bean bag chair and having a few cocktails at sunset. Definitely sunset is best, otherwise nothing great.
review: great swim chilling water surf lesson tourist trapping available best feature sunset view sunset amaze worth rent bean bag chair cocktail sunset definitely sunset best nothing great

Content: There is a fun buzz around this beach. Although its not the whitest sand or the most tranquil, its good to come in the late afternoon with friends.
review: fun buzz around although white sand tranquil good come late afternoon friend

Content: Viewing sunset or enjoying breeze night wind, this place has them. But the waitress were a kind of bit off, we were receiving our orders 30 minutes later while they so responsive at picking up bule's.A good place to have a overnight chit-chat but should have improved their service consistently without discrimination.
review: view sunset enjoy breeze night wind place waitress kind bit receive order 30 minute later responsive pick bulesa good place overnight chitchat improved service consistently without discrimination

Content: Nice beach lots of people trying to sell things though, just pretend you are asleep and they still wont leave you alone. Like along all the beaches you can hire chairs and surfboards, and have a great day.
review: nice lot people try sell thing though pretend asleep still wont leave alone along beach hire chair surfboard great day

Content: Love this beach. It's very clean. Locals selling their ware but don't bother you. Lovely place to watch the sunset
review: love clean local sell ware dont bother lovely place watch sunset

Content: Great beach to  catch up with friends walk along or have a drink or two, a feed or just watch the sunset as many people do
review: great catch friend walk along drink two feed watch sunset many people

Content: Spent most of a day here just relaxing after a full day of travel. Hired a pair of beds 400,000 (maybe should have negotiated but jet lag was in full swing). Lots of surf schools using the water so no swimming allowed and when I dipped myself in the current was very strong so be careful. As we left around 5, everywhere was setting up for the evening with stages being set up at each bar for live music so I'm sure the evenings will be fun. Not a place to go if after some piece and quiet as was very busy.
review: spent day relax full day travel hire pair bed 400000 maybe negotiate jet lag full swing lot surf school use water swimming allow dipped current strong careful leave around 5 everywhere set even stage set bar live music im sure evening will fun place go piece quiet busy

Content: Yes you guessed it this place is one of the most expensive places to eat or drink in Bali..Dont know why....it is an awfull concrete building no atmoshere at all, the ocean view is great but thats it,be aware also parts of the resort insist on a dress code in some areas........The local bars/restaurants either side of this cold unwelcoming building have the same great views only with a much cheaper price tag on the food & drink that is served & seriously a much brighter & happier constitutioin, it would seem they actually train the staff in this place to be alouf & stuck up " not sure why you would go to Bali to experience that sort of nonsence?Do you & your wallet a favour & pass on this place for a night out.........
review: yes guess place one expensive place eat drink balidont know whyit awfull concrete building atmoshere ocean view great thats itbe aware part resort insist dress code areasthe local barsrestaurants either side cold unwelcoming building great view much cheap price tag food drink serve seriously much brighter happier constitutioin seem actually train staff place alouf stuck sure go bali experience sort nonsencedo wallet favour pas place night

Content: For swimming maybee not the best spot, but for surfing or even learning how to surf, a great placeSunbeds however are way to pricy
review: swim maybee best spot surf even learn surf great placesunbeds way pricy

Content: What a fabulous setting to eat dinner while watching the sun set.Only issue we had was all the people trying to sell us stuff, this went on all night and while I appreciate people in Bali work dam hard to make a living, harder than kiwis could imagine it is not overly pleasant when eating dinner.
review: fabulous set eat dinner watch sun setonly issue people try sell u stuff go night appreciate people bali work dam hard make live hard kiwis imagine overly pleasant eating dinner

Content: Good beach but everyday Red Flag for no swimming allowed! Still adults can and are going in!Very strong current and not suitable for young children.Nice relaxing rental beach beds - make a deal for day price ! Lots of beach selling ladies - very expensive so know what you're willing to pay :-)
review: good everyday red flag swimming allow still adult go invery strong current suitable young childrennice relax rental bed make deal day price lot sell lady expensive know youre willing pay

Content: Great friendly atmosphere where the bars put out bean bag chairs which are so comfortable.  Lovely food, great music and atmosphere.
review: great friendly atmosphere bar put bean bag chair comfortable lovely food great music atmosphere

Content: My husband and i loved Double Six beach. Beers, good vibes and some sun on a beanbag is the perfect way to spend the afternoon in Bali and watch the sunset.No need to go to pretentious beach clubs (Potato Head) and pay ridiculous prices for a beer or cocktail.
review: husband love double six beer good vibe sun beanbag perfect way spend afternoon bali watch sunsetno need go pretentious club potato head pay ridiculous price beer cocktail

Content: Catch some waves, drink some beer, stroll along the beach, watch the sunset, enjoy a game of soccer or lounge in one of the many beachside restaurants and enjoy a night of karaoke. The beach captures everything that is great about Bali, its welcoming, relaxed and just about always having a good time!
review: catch wave drink beer stroll along watch sunset enjoy game soccer lounge one many beachside restaurant enjoy night karaoke capture everything great bali welcome relaxed always good time

Content: Had been at Double six Beach today with the family (2kids 7&10h, and the beach has been perfectly clean. What you need to know is, that from Dec-Mar), the beach is NOT be cleaned, as there is too much garbage coming out of the sea because of the winds. So, you cannot go during that time. This is not because of the Bali garbage, but because of the tide, most coming from Indonesia mainland. From Apr-Nov, the beach is being cleaned daily- sposnored by several large organisations. Only 4 stars, as the beach is pretty crowded wth a lot of low quality beach bars.
review: double six today family 2kids 710h perfectly clean need know decmar clean much garbage come sea wind go time bali garbage tide come indonesia mainland aprnov clean daily sposnored several large organisation 4 star pretty crowd wth lot low quality bar

Content: Great bars/restaurants and amazing spot to kick back and watch the sunsets from the beach. Most bars have seating on the beach and quite often a band playing. Pricing is very affordable.
review: great barsrestaurants amaze spot kick back watch sunset bar seat quite often band play pricing affordable

Content: Visited this stretch of the beach right in front of the Double Six Hotel because our villa happen to have their own beach corner there. Was pleasantly surprised that the beach is wide and clean and not too crowded. We were glad that our villa had their own quality sunbed and shades far superior than those beach vendors' chargeable ones. The waves at places are huge and strong, ideal for the budding surfers but the spot in front of ours was fine for adults. Water is clean though visibility poor. The occasional trinkets vendors can be irritating but they get the message after a few polite rejections. Had a great time here lazing away and dipping in the water. The best part is we had a private outdoor shower to wash up before hitting the shops and eateries of the Double Six area.
review: visit stretch right front double six hotel villa happen corner pleasantly surprise wide clean crowd glad villa quality sunbed shade far superior vendor chargeable one wave place huge strong ideal bud surfer spot front fine adult water clean though visibility poor occasional trinket vendor irritate message polite rejection great time laze away dip water best part private outdoor shower wash hit shop eatery double six area

Content: In Semyniak and at the beach you are never bored. There are lots of things to do and see for everybody.
review: semyniak never bore lots thing see everybody

Content: This beach is nice.  The regular beach sellers like to target foreigners but are not intimidating.  The black sand stains your clothes and your feet so you might want to wash off when you leave.  The beach has an array of bars and several live bands playing....it almost seems like battle of the bands but sitting in the right place will drown out the sound of nearby bands.
review: nice regular seller target foreigner intimidate black sand stain clothes foot might want wash leave array bar several live band playingit almost seem battle band sit right place will drown sound nearby band

Content: A clean beach with loads of beds to choose from. Enjoyed watching sunsets and walking.Beware of people just wanting to sell you something - this beach is no exception.Dont forget to by your lantern to let off at night time
review: clean load bed choose enjoy watch sunset walkingbeware people want sell something exceptiondont forget lantern let night time

Content: We found Paradise ! Absolutely loved every minute of the stay. It was 5 days of bliss ! We got upgraded as it was our honeymoon and we just kived the room ! The balcony was long enough to have and train a football team ha. We also had complimentary drinks and honeymoon welcome upon arrival. It couldn't be anymore professional than it was set up. The bathroom with a tv attached right in front of the bath tub. The shower in both forms shower head and over head tropical fall. The staff so pleasant and ok its part of the job but it just felt more organic than forced. We were late to the pool a few mornings and worried about no sun lounges but the pool and lagoon staff always found room for us. This was a big plus for my new wife as she loves the sun. It would be a disservice to name individuals because every one made the stay so pleasant for us. We dine on the rooftop on day one and the view is something to behold, the view especially at sunset is magical. Plus the food was really good and reasonable compared to irish prices anyway. On our last night we visited the plantation grill bar in the hotel, we stepped in the elevator and stepped out in 1922 New York. It was like the old time Jazz Bars from New York movies. The ambiance, the food, the music, the conpany and the drinks were all top class 5 star rating. A little pricey but well worth the quality. I must mention "Koma" our waiter , smiling from ear to ear and when he heard it was our honeymoon well he brought out a plate with happy honeymoon and some specialist chocolates, classy touch. A great guy with great manners and welcoming approach. When we were checking out it all became very real that our stay was our with Double six Bali. Id struggle to say ive been anywhere with better service. We are sad to be leaving here and will hopefully make a return in some years to come as it was just a holistic, spiritual and all round bloody amazing honeymoon !Thank you Audrey and James Claffey
review: find paradise absolutely love every minute stay 5 day bliss get upgraded honeymoon kived room balcony long enough train football team ha complimentary drink honeymoon welcome upon arrival couldnt anymore professional set bathroom tv attach right front bath tub shower form shower head head tropical fall staff pleasant ok part job felt organic force late pool morning worry sun lounge pool lagoon staff always find room u big plus new wife love sun disservice name individual every one make stay pleasant u dine rooftop day one view something behold view especially sunset magical plus food really good reasonable compare irish price anyway last night visit plantation grill bar hotel step elevator step 1922 new york old time jazz bar new york movie ambiance food music conpany drink top class 5 star rating little pricey well worth quality must mention koma waiter smile ear ear heard honeymoon well bring plate happy honeymoon specialist chocolates classy touch great guy great manner welcome approach checking become real stay double six bali id struggle say ive anywhere well service sad leave will hopefully make return year come holistic spiritual round bloody amaze honeymoon thank audrey james claffey

Content: A fun place to relax while swimming in the ocean and while enjoying the sunset a delicious meal free of noise
review: fun place relax swim ocean enjoy sunset delicious meal free noise

Content: Scammers around the public toilet block it off and demand a 5000 rupiah payment if you need to use it. What a crap place. People will just end up urinating in the water. First place I've ever visited that needed a payment to relieve yourself.
review: scammer around public toilet block demand 5000 rupiah payment need use crap place people will end urinating water first place ive visit needed payment relieve

Content: This beach is always busy. Considering the surge of growth over the past 20yrs. It was the dead end of bali. Now you cant park and is very full. The inlet river to the right is not the best and is sometimes very dirty depending on the day.
review: always busy consider surge growth past 20yrs dead end bali now cant park full inlet river right best sometimes dirty depend day

Content: Double six the best beach.. the best view, the best in Bali.. come on visit Bali and Denpasar - Indonesia
review: double six best best view best bali come visit bali denpasar indonesia

Content: The beach at Double Six (Legian) is the best of the beaches running south from Kuta to Seminyak. There is a much larger beach area from the water to the hotels/restaurants etc. The Seminyak beach is steeper and not as much beach area, whilst the beach at Kuta is just too busy.South of Double Six road is Legian, lots of beach bars and restaurants, north of Double Six and there are a number of low end restaurants selling Indo food, burgers etc,
review: double six legian best beach run south kuta seminyak much large area water hotelsrestaurants etc seminyak steeper much area whilst kuta busysouth double six road legian lot bar restaurant north double six number low end restaurant sell indo food burger etc

Content: Go visit Made Kolu's Beach Bar. Made is so helpful & provides great beach beds, surf lessons, cocktails, cold drinks & a great fun vibe - he's our go to guy at the beach. Whilst they all provide a similar experience at Double Six - I think Made goes the extra mile.
review: go visit make kolus bar make helpful provide great bed surf lesson cocktail cold drink great fun vibe he go guy whilst provide similar experience double six think make go extra mile

Content: The beach is great , lots of space and many seats to choose from if u come early . Around 50 for a seat. We spent the whole day, the kids had a blast as one of them rented a boogie board for 50 full day and our son went for the surf class -1 1/2 hours for 250 with one of small shacks renting out gear- he got to keep the surf board to practice all day. We asked for rip curl however you had to book a day in advance and pay 1000000 for the lesson . The guyWas great and spent most of the day giving him tips. The only downside was all the sellers insisting we buy their things. Spectacular sunset.
review: great lot space many seat choose u come early around 50 seat spent whole day kid blast one rent boogie board 50 full day son go surf class 1 12 hour 250 one small shack rent gear get keep surf board practice day ask rip curl book day advance pay 1000000 lesson guywas great spent day give tip downside seller insist buy thing spectacular sunset

Content: We walked along this beach a couple of times and couldn't help notice that the surfers were coming right in among the swimmers.Having said that, it is and has long been known as a surfing area.I won't swim where there are surfboards.Having said that, it is a lovely beach to walk on. The sand feels good and if you walk where the water washes up, the temperature of the water is perfect.There are also no shortage of hotel restaurants at which you can stop at if you've got your wallet on you.

Content: You need to pay a small fee to rent an umbrella or a reclining chair and relax though. Nothing is free in Bali 😂The beach, however, is much cleaner and quieter than Kuta, which led to the 5 star! My local friend recommended this beach too, and he was right. It's not far from the city center, and quite well-maintained! :)

Content: Beers served to your beach chair, ladies attending to you for pedicure and manicure. Simple folks who leave you alone when you say no to any hawker goods politely.

Content: Large beach mostly clean. Beware of steam run off avoid it go a little south water cleaner. Good waves for surfing & body surfing
review: large mostly clean beware steam run avoid go little south water cleaner good wave surf body surf

Content: This place good for family if they want to learn surfing.Many surfing school here and they was professional. We happy the surfing instructor good in English, so we can have fast learning.And this place good for waiting sunset

Content: Surfing was especially good here, and there are many restaurants located on the road parallel to the beach.  Ideal for starting a long beach walk all the way down to Kuta.  Closer to sunset, all the beachside cafes take out their bean bag chairs and set them on the sand.  Great vibe and atmosphere especially for sunset and continuing on throughout the night with live music!!!! must see!
review: surf especially good many restaurant locate road parallel ideal start long walk way kuta close sunset beachside cafe take bean bag chair set sand great vibe atmosphere especially sunset continue throughout night live music must see

Content: Rented surf boards in Europe earlier - but ended up paddling the water. Great surf schools and perfect waves made it possible for all ten of us to surf the waves in just two hours. Amazing!
review: rent surf board europe earlier end paddling water great surf school perfect wave make possible ten u surf wave two hour amaze

Content: The beach is live all the time, nice place to take a sun bath , spend the complete day with couple of beer, lot of restaurants nearby
review: live time nice place take sun bath spend complete day couple beer lot restaurant nearby

Content: Great night on the beach watching the sunset while drinking cocktails and getting a foot rub. Loved the atmosphere the people and the band while sitting in the comfy beanbags.
review: great night watch sunset drinking cocktail get foot rub love atmosphere people band sit comfy beanbag

Content: Double Six Beach is one of best beaches in Bali. It has fine sands throughout and no stones to hurt your feet. It is great for surfing and swimming. The local lads who teach surfing were great and could speak good English. The beach also has lots of eating places and the food both veg and non veg was good. Prices for the drinks were also reasonable and if you ordered if while lying on your sunbed via the boys who were serving it was tax free and no service charge payable.Cold Fresh Coconut were excellent and so was the local Bintang beer. After seeing other beaches in Bali I am of the opinion that Double Six Beach was the best one around.
review: double six one best beach bali fine sand throughout stone hurt foot great surf swim local lad teach surf great speak good english lot eat place food veg non veg good price drink reasonable order lie sunbed via boy serve tax free service charge payablecold fresh coconut excellent local bintang beer see beach bali opinion double six best one around

Content: This is a nice wide open beach with minimal sunbeds, so no to overcrowdrd. There are a lot of sellers on the beach and you be repeatedly hassled by them to buy some of their rubbish or even worse allow them to massage your legs and feet. They can and do get annoyed if you don't support them by buying something.The sunbeds were $10 for 2 beds but this was dependant on how long you wanted it, what time of day and who the boy was selling the idea to you. Once you have secured a price expect nothing else from the boy, even if your being hassled by the sellers  they won't get involved.Overall I think the beach is OK but many many people just  bring a Towel and sit on the beach.... mostly the younger people. The sea looked safe enough for the kids but I would advise supervision as the waves can get big and powerful. As i said my day at the beach was nothing special. I've certainly been to better beaches with better,nicer facilities and amenities.

Content: Was here is June 2017 and was a great place to pass the time watching the waves, people and drinking a nice beer or three.
review: june 2017 great place pas time watch wave people drink nice beer three

Content: Its very crowded and not very clean beach but its middle beach for resting.its nice at nights and the prices are good
review: crowd clean middle restingits nice night price good

Content: We walked from Double Six to Potato Head. A lovely walk in the ever-present breeze. But it's sad to see such a beautiful location scattered with plastic debris. The debris created mainly by the very reason the beach ( and other areas ) needs to be clean - tourism and all the people and industries that sustain it.There's a simple solution to some of the pollution - the government should ban the single use plastic bags and have a monetary incentive for recycling soft plastics.
review: walk double six potato head lovely walk everpresent breeze sad see beautiful location scatter plastic debris debris create mainly reason area need clean tourism people industry sustain ittheres simple solution pollution government ban single use plastic bag monetary incentive recycle soft plastic

Content: Good for a surf during the day and by night beach shacks playing live accoustic cover songs where you can chill with a cocktail on a bean bag.
review: good surf day night shack play live accoustic cover song chill cocktail bean bag

Content: Nice spa and bar I really enjoying my time. and the service was excellent and the drinks were lovely. The pool is great and the staff were very nice!
review: nice spa bar really enjoying time service excellent drink lovely pool great staff nice

Content: We came here on a whim, as it was still early to go elsewhere. Enjoyed the walk along the beach, the eye candy, and dogs frolicking in the sand and sea. Watch the surfers or learn to surf as there are plenty of shops offering lessons, and to 'hang out with Bali boys'. There are deck chairs or bean bags available for rent, so nice comfortable sunbathing places, or you could bring your own towel too.
review: come whim still early go elsewhere enjoy walk along eye candy dog frolic sand sea watch surfer learn surf plenty shop offer lesson hang bali boy deck chair bean bag available rent nice comfortable sunbathe place bring towel

Content: This place does not get enough credit!! So glad we found this place. Awesome to watch the sun go down with live music and awesome drinks and food. Sitting on bean bags on white sand with candles is picture perfect. 100% worth the trip!
review: place enough credit glad find place awesome watch sun go live music awesome drink food sit bean bag white sand candle picture perfect 100 worth trip

Content: I first travelled to bali in the 70s. It's just such a shame the locals don't take care of the rubbish situation. The government needs to step up and help with this problem. It's a sad state of affairs. One of Bali's biggest attractions- the beach! Has become overloved. It is not a tourist problem it needs to be addressed at local levels. Indonesia needs to step up and take responsibility for their own environmental problems. Tourists come from countries where we are educated to sustain a clean environment. The education system needs to address this asap.
review: first travel bali 70 shame local dont take care rubbish situation government need step help problem sad state affair one bali big attraction become overloved tourist problem need address local level indonesia need step take responsibility environmental problem tourists come country educate sustain clean environment education system need address asap

Content: Great pool, bar and spa but pricey. I enjoyed my day there. The service was great and the drinks were lovely. The pool is great and the staff were attentive. I enjoyed the spa but it's on the pricey end! Much higher than other hotels in the area. It was lovely though but I'm not sure it warranted the price overall.
review: great pool bar spa pricey enjoy day service great drink lovely pool great staff attentive enjoy spa pricey end much high hotel area lovely though im sure warrant price overall

Content: We loved this beach for the sunset view, didn't surf or swim as we had young kids-but loved having a drink on the bean bag chairs and enjoyed the beautiful sunset!  A must!
review: love sunset view didnt surf swim young kidsbut love drink bean bag chair enjoy beautiful sunset must

Content: Standard long Kuta style beach. One of the better surf spots because of a stream, but that was polluted - not so nice. Locals (friendly ones) dominate in the surf so hard for intermediate surfers to get waves. Surf schools, etc.
review: standard long kuta style one good surf spot stream pollute nice local friendly one dominate surf hard intermediate surfer wave surf school etc

Content: The beach is beautiful and there's plenty of comfortable loungers available. There are lots of people trying to sell everything you can imagine and it can be a little overwhelming. Everything that is being sold on the beach is at an inflated price. Just a warning. Two beach chairs can be rented for $5 CAD per day but you have to negotiate. There is a rip tide and no swimming signs posted all along the beach but there were hundreds of people in the water. It's OK. for surfing and chilling in the water near the shore but I wouldn't go for a swim there.Surf lessons and board rentals can be bought for $30-35 for a two hour rental and board for the day.
review: beautiful there plenty comfortable lounger available lot people try sell everything imagine little overwhelm everything sell inflated price warn two chair rent 5 cad per day negotiate rip tide swim sign post along hundred people water ok surf chill water near shore wouldnt go swim theresurf lesson board rental buy 3035 two hour rental board day

Content: It is a busy beach, especially in the afternoon. You could spend a good time here with you best friend with having pizza or drink. The are many food shop here.
review: busy especially afternoon spend good time best friend pizza drink many food shop

Content: After the disappointment of Seminyak Beach, Double 6 is a different scene altogether.  There are good restaurants along the beach, sun umbrellas and surf "schools" galore.  A good spot to be active or just watch the world go by.

Content: Double Six Beach is a very beautiful, relaxed beach within easy walking distance of most Seminyak hotels and villas.  I am lucky enough to live in Seminyak and regularly walk along the beach. There are a variety of bars, restaurants on the beach front with beach umbrellas and beach cushions.There are many sunbed opportunities at reasonable daily rates. Live music, surfing classes, surf and sunshine. What more could you wish for. Highly recommend.
review: double six beautiful relaxed within easy walk distance seminyak hotel villas lucky enough live seminyak regularly walk along variety bar restaurant front umbrella cushionsthere many sunbed opportunity reasonable daily rate live music surfing class surf sunshine wish highly recommend

Content: Lots to do on this centrally located beach with great bars - we went to Double 6 Rooftop and then The Sands - lots of surfing and a beautiful beach - nice beach to walk and lots of bars etc. if you want to take a break
review: lot centrally locate great bar go double 6 rooftop sand lot surf beautiful nice walk lot bar etc want take break

Content: Worth visiting... Take beach view room... Very good break fast. Veg preferences available. Very very cooperative staff.. Thanks to Mr. Vincent pillai n special thanks to Sari for serving with beautiful smile

Content: it's more of a surfers beach....waves are impressive!!spacious quiet beach (unlike Katu beach) with many kiosks serving local and western food and drinks...if you're a sun worshipper and looking for quiet and relaxation then this is the beach for you!

Content: We stayed at the Double Six Luxury Hotel.  We chose not to swim in the water at the beach as it was very dirty - we swam in the Hotel pool.  There are some great beach bars in this area and they are a lot of fun and many have entertainment.   Great place to watch the sunset.
review: stay double six luxury hotel choose swim water dirty swam hotel pool great bar area lot fun many entertainment great place watch sunset

Content: What a great atmosphere sitting with your feet in the sand having a cold drink watching the sun do down after another beautiful day in Bali.

Content: A nice clean beach with sun lounges provided by the drink vendors. I settled in under an umbrella with a nice guy keeping my drinks coming as required. I asked him to keep away the pushy locals trying to give you massages, magic mushrooms etc. and he was really good at maintaining my privacy. The sunset was a bonus.
review: nice clean sun lounge provide drink vendor settle umbrella nice guy keep drink come require asked keep away pushy local try give massage magic mushroom etc really good maintain privacy sunset bonus

Content: Beach is ok just if you are white/tourist they actually hunting for you just to rip you off not the nicest experience

Content: Double six has some good waves at moment where the stream flows out. Unfortunately recent rain has turned the water brown and stanky. Try not to drink lol. Best mid to high tide.
review: double six good wave moment stream flow unfortunately recent rain turn water brown stanky try drink lol best mid high tide

Content: It is really disappointing to see what unregulated development has done to what is potentially a spectacular beach. There is clearly an infrastructure problem which sees streams dumping all sorts of rubbish directly into the sea. This impacts water quality as well as dumps all sorts of plastic rubbish on the beach. This is the dark side of tourism laid bare, and one which all tourists must take some responsibility for. Having said that there are still great opportunities to enjoy the amenity of the beach, watch a great sunset and contribute positively to the environment.
review: really disappointing see unregulated development do potentially spectacular clearly infrastructure problem see stream dump sort rubbish directly sea impact water quality well dump sort plastic rubbish dark side tourism lay bare one tourists must take responsibility say still great opportunity enjoy amenity watch great sunset contribute positively environment

Content: Many people were surfing and the crowd was good. A lot of beach benches around as well. Good to take a stroll from here
review: many people surf crowd good lot bench around well good take stroll

Content: Fabulous clean beach, gorgeous sunsets Great beach "bars" for pre dinner drinks watching the amazing sunsets
review: fabulous clean gorgeous sunset great bar pre dinner drink watch amazing sunset

Content: As a result of the previous day's rain (we were told) the water turned a hideous brown every so often which prevented us from swimming.  We had one days swimming in the 8 nights we were there.  Fortunately double six had a pool.The view of the sea is always soothing though.  The people selling trinkets were kind enough to leave us alone. I would recommend going to the other side of Bali if you were after clean and clear sea water
review: result previous day rain told water turn hideous brown every often prevent u swim one day swim 8 night fortunately double six poolthe view sea always soothe though people sell trinket kind enough leave u alone recommend go side bali clean clear sea water

Content: Fairly clean beach with lot of restaurants, spas and shopping stores near by. Excellent for morning walk.

Content: The sea view was nice with nice weather but it wasn't clean in many places and there was dogs I liked the idea of sitting a while in front the sea but didn't like the idea of swimming there

Content: We stayed at luxury double 6.  The beach directly in front is dirty.  The water is brown and we were told that this was from the rains.  We were here 5 days and it never rained and the water never changed.  The beach is filthy and something should be done to clean it up.  Plastic is washed up everyday.  Coming from NZ where we have such beautiful beaches this is a disappointment and a serious problem.  If a beach is what you want then find somewhere else.  We came to experience everything and had a beautiful pool at our hotel so enjoyed it anyway.  Sunset on the beach is my favorite time 🌤
review: stayed luxury double 6 directly front dirty water brown tell rain 5 day never rain water never change filthy something do clean plastic wash everyday come nz beautiful beach disappointment serious problem want find somewhere come experience everything beautiful pool hotel enjoy anyway sunset favorite time

Content: Beah was dirty, with toxic materials (similar to orange paint) causing beach closure. Further down (+ a km) beach was open, but couch hire (offered at exhorbitant rates - negotiate down from A$20 ph) only option - and couches were as clean as the beach. Walk down, swim between the (infrequent) flags, and head back to the hotel pool.

Content: Nice beach but you can't really swim in the sea. Nicer than semiyak beach for sure. We paid 2000000 rupas for two beds and umbrella. review: nice cant really swim sea nicer semiyak sure pay 2000000 rupas two bed umbrella ok hot long time bit expensive look really come alive sunset kuta definitely cheap semiyak

Content: The waves are great but the sand and the first 40 metres or so of the water are not so nice. You can only guess why the water is so brown and there is so much rubbish embedded in the sand. Hopefully the island will improve this over time.

A clean beach brings other forms of income too.

Content: This beach is nice and clean.  Sometimes a bit rough but overall an enjoyable day out spent here.  Some amazing hotels and restaurants here.  If you need to find it our driver Putu at fair dinkum transport (on tripadvisor) was a great driver and can show you exactly where To go.

Content: Lots of beach bars and restaurants, good service and umbrellas and loungers easy to get, surf schools and surf board hire. Go for walks, swim or wait for the sunset parties. Plus the hawkers are very aggressive and are constantly coming up to you. Nonstop!!!
