Content: This time we managed to stretch a normal weekend to best possible extent for Bali Trip.We wanted to go to south Bali as our last trip to this part of Asia was more to do with serene mountains,volcanic lakes and monkey forest.South Bali has fabulous beaches starting with Seminyak,Legian and all the way to south Kuta.We chose to stay at Pearl Hotel on Double Six beach road hardly 10 minutes walking distance from all the happening places of South Bali.We took an early flight on Friday afternoon and reached by evening.Anthony,who is the owner of Pearl Hotel had made all arrangements for our pick up from airport.It took just 30 mins to reach the boutique hotel and we dumped our bags in the hotel room and headed for Double Six beach.There were plenty of beach shacks with live music and bean bags on the sand with little colourful umbrellas.'The Sand' has a beautiful set up right on the beach and local band playing.We enjoyed some good nachos and satay along with free flowing drinks and music from Balinese Jennifer Lopez.Night well spent we retired to our hotel.This place is very quiet with a nice pool in the midst of the private rooms with all amenities.After breakfast on Saturday morning we were back on the beach strolling,walking past the huge surfing waves creating a misty environment.There were couches on the beach that one can rent for 10 $ per hour.We had a treat for ourselves on a double couch enjoying breeze on our faces,beautiful view and Amy Tan's 'Saving Fish from drowning'.We had a lazy laid back lunch in Hotel Oberoi with trendy DJ playing and some delicious cocktails I have ever tasted in my life as the relentless waves continued crushing on the beach and created a beautiful rhythm as we sat there sipping our refreshing cocktail and fresh thin crust wooden pizza.The evening was well spent watching the most beautiful sunset ever experienced,hopping beach cafes,floating paper lanterns and watching fire dance all on the beach.We explored Laplancha and The Sand once again this time.Now that we had the entire Sunday to be spent as per our whims we spent it a bit differently pampering ourselves with authentic Balinese massage followed by lunch at the famous MehraPutti on the most happening streets of Semninyak. One can't resist from shopping as you walk past the best shopping boutiques.Watched breathtaking sunset from Hotel Oberoi lounge.one has to make advance booking as this place becomes crowded as the sun sets on the beaches on Legian ,view to cherish for life.Finally we headed to Potato Head for poolside dinner.Both Potato Head and MehraPutti are exquisite dining experiences one must have while at South Bali.We had a morning flight to catch on Monday and thus ended our not so planned but one of the best backpackers tour in Indonesia.Not to forget Pearl had arranged for taxi at the right time in such wee hours even though the reception was closed and their professionalism is much appreciated for making our stay smooth and memorable.
review: time manage stretch normal weekend best possible extent bali tripwe want go south bali last trip part asia serene mountainsvolcanic lake monkey forestsouth bali fabulous beach start seminyaklegian way south kutawe choose stay pearl hotel double six road hardly 10 minute walk distance happen place south baliwe take early flight friday afternoon reach eveninganthonywho owner pearl hotel make arrangement pick airportit take 30 min reach boutique hotel dump bags hotel room head double six beachthere plenty shack live music bean bag sand little colourful umbrellasthe sand beautiful set right local band playingwe enjoy good nacho satay along free flow drink music balinese jennifer lopeznight well spent retire hotelthis place quiet nice pool midst private room amenitiesafter breakfast saturday morning back strollingwalking past huge surf wave create misty environmentthere couch one rent 10 per hourwe treat double couch enjoy breeze facesbeautiful view amy tan save fish drowningwe lazy lay back lunch hotel oberoi trendy dj play delicious cocktail taste life relentless wave continue crush create beautiful rhythm sit sip refresh cocktail fresh thin crust wooden pizzathe even well spent watch beautiful sunset experiencedhopping cafesfloating paper lanterns watch fire dance beachwe explore laplancha sand timenow entire sunday spent per whim spent bit differently pamper authentic balinese massage follow lunch famous mehraputti happen street semninyak one cant resist shopping walk past best shopping boutiqueswatched breathtaking sunset hotel oberoi loungeone make advance book place becomes crowd sun set beach legian view cherish lifefinally head potato head poolside dinnerboth potato head mehraputti exquisite din experience one must south baliwe morning flight catch monday thus end plan one best backpacker tour indonesianot forget pearl arrange taxi right time wee hour even though reception close professionalism much appreciate make stay smooth memorable

Content: A walk along the beach is one of the pleasures of a Bali visit.Double Six Beach is fronted by Luxury Hotels right to the beach.Dozens of AirAsia umbrellas line the beach along with  beach chairs all of which have a price on them if you wish to spend time.The hawkers are there but not too bad.Always a highlight during a visit.

Content: Double 6 is one of the nicest beaches on Bali. It is very big and stretches from Kuta upto Seminyak. Double 6 is perfctly located in the middle and has some great waves for surfing and some nice beachbars and restaurants.Mind you prices are relatively high, specially in the busy seasons

Content: Our go to beach in Seminyak. We've been learning to surf here. The waves are fast so it's hard work, but it's fun to try. Great casual bars and beach restaurants. Nice place to chill.

Content: This review relates to day time visits, not night time:Once you get past the filthy street and open drains, I found a surprisingly pleasant experience. Enjoyed sitting in the bars, by myself, having a beer and pondering life.I did not however, go swimming here, so cannot comment on the quality of the water.

Content: heaps of food choices and places to drink.  From warungs to large hotel bars.  A choice of foods and loads of cold beers.  The ladies give good foot massages and are always up for a good chat and laugh.
review: heap food choice place drink warungs large hotel bar choice food load cold beer lady give good foot massage always good chat laugh

Content: Its THE best beach in Bali to spend the day with your family and friends. Its not crazy crowed like Kuta or Legian Beach. Also for me, the crowd here seemed a bit better in terms of "class" (sorry for being politically incorrect) ... but its true!!! Kuta and Legian beaches are like fish markets compared to this one. The Double6 beach is much much cleaner and the restaurants on the beach are quite nice, nothing great but just nice. You can rent seats/umbrella for USD 20 for the whole day, surf boards are USD 7.5, body boards are USD 4 !!! There are beer guys right at the beach, they serve really chilled beers and drinks (with nuts) right to you on the sand. Its awesome. But the best part was the water, it was warm to perfection. We simply loved our time at the Double6 beach. I highly recommend this one. Why I don't like the other beaches: 1. Nusa Dua : Nice and clean, but they are mostly Shell Beaches, not comfortable for going for a swim. The waves are quite calm as well. 2. Kuta & Legian : Too crowed and a bit dirty.
review: best bali spend day family friends crazy crow kuta legian crowd seem bit good term class sorry politically incorrect true kuta legian beach fish market compare one double6 much much clean restaurant quite nice nothing great nice rent seatsumbrella usd 20 whole day surf board usd 75 body board usd 4 beer guy right serve really chill beer drink nut right sand awesome best part water warm perfection simply love time double6 highly recommend one dont beach 1 nusa dua nice clean mostly shell beach comfortable go swim wave quite calm well 2 kuta legian crow bit dirty

Content: Surf lessons available nice beach sand slight grey colour but beautiful swell does vary.    Calm yesterday 6 foot today but that's the biggest in our seven days.  Kids no problem.    3-yrs with hand held of adult near buy would be safe
review: surf lesson available nice sand slight grey colour beautiful swell vary calm yesterday 6 foot today thats big seven day kid problem 3yrs hand hold adult near buy safe

Content: Double6 is a seasoned spot for sundown drinks and it is amazing for that. The scene is set and adjusted to lure unsuspecting tourists to sit by these colourful beanbags like fly to a trap. The bands that play live music is a good touch, they start somewhere around 7-10 pm on weekends. Not sure on weekdays. Throughout the afternoon however, you will be asked 20 times by random people selling a range of random items, from bouncy glowing balls, to massage, to hair braiding, surf lessons, pirate boat shaped kites, machetes, the list goes on. Next time, i will video and put together a clip, lol!Anywho, the waters during the months of Sept -Nov are sort of dirty, with floating bags and beer cans. It doesn't sweep in the shore and stays by the break. It is quite visible on a non wavey day. There are plenty of little shops where you can but beer (IDR20k) for or snacks that they can bring to your rented sun lounges for IDR 50k (if you can haggle like a Chinese would :D Thanks mom!) to IDR 150k. Overall an ok experience, but not something I want to do again, or reminisce on.
review: double6 season spot sundown drink amaze scene set adjusted lure unsuspecting tourist sit colourful beanbag fly trap band play live music good touch start somewhere around 710 pm weekend sure weekday throughout afternoon will ask 20 time random people sell range random item bouncy glow ball massage hair braid surf lesson pirate boat shape kit machete list go next time will video put together clip lolanywho water month sept nov sort dirty floating bag beer can doesnt sweep shore stay break quite visible non wavey day plenty little shop beer idr20k snack bring rent sun lounge idr 50k haggle chinese d thanks mom idr 150k overall ok experience something want reminisce

Content: Double six beach is always a destination for my Wife and I, We love to arrive around 545pm, Just before the crowds roll in, Find a prime seat in one of the many beach bars, Order a cold beer and a snack and watch the Sunset roll across the countryside, For about an hr you forget the world exists.You will get approached by the beach sellers, but they are polite and prompt to dispatch.there is no sunset if it has been raining, but the experience is great none the less.
review: double six always destination wife love arrive around 545pm crowd roll find prime seat one many bar order cold beer snack watch sunset roll across countryside hr forget world existsyou will approach seller polite prompt dispatchthere sunset rain experience great none less

Not the ideal paradise when you think of Bali, but it was a decent beach to run in the morning and to look at the surfers, bargain with different vendors and relax.

Content: Do not come here with children unless you are here to party it's noise after noise. The music on the beach goes on until midnight every night. Very loud techno and karaoke not a nice tranquil holiday we imagined Bali to be. Very disappointed with this tacky style holiday

Content: Beautiful rooms, comfy bed, great pool, unbelievable rooftop bar, would return to this hotel anytime.

Content: We got to try out a few different beaches. We preferred Seminyak Beach as it was calmer and less people for us as a family. Double Six Beach is probably best for surfers and those who want to socialise with others. It's got lots of bars on the beach so noisier than Seminyak Beach.
review: get try different beach prefer seminyak calmer less people u family double six probably best surfer want socialise others get lots bar noisier seminyak

Content: Relatively  clean beach by Bali standards. Lots of food outlets, with various types of  bean bags on the beach. An interesting place to have an evening meal and watch the sunset. You will need to find a sweet spot between the many music groups and Djs all playing very close to each other. This beach does have hawkers selling various items, but not as pushy as in Kuta. If you are in one of the beach side food outlets they tend to leave you alone. Beware as the tide comes in it will reach some of the bean bag restaurants.
review: relatively clean bali standard lot food outlet various type bean bag interest place even meal watch sunset will need find sweet spot many music group dj play close hawker sell various item pushy kuta one side food outlet tend leave alone beware tide come will reach bean bag restaurant

Content: Good surf and beach facilities, plenty restaurants and bars Cocoon Day bar on beach and a rocking place.
review: good surf facility plenty restaurant bar cocoon day bar rock place

Content: This beach is very touristy and the busy areas in front of the hotels is a hawker's paradise, hassling you constantly for what ever you want or need, but further up the beach it is nicer, and less polluted, not sure if I would swim there! Bali has very different laws regulating sewerage treatment (or lack of treatment), just an observation IMO, there are many much more beautiful places to swim in Bali, pick one.
review: touristy busy area front hotel hawker paradise hassle constantly want need nicer less polluted sure swim bali different law regulate sewerage treatment lack treatment observation imo many much beautiful place swim bali pick one

Content: I spent a gorgeous (hot) day walking the beach from Seminyak to Legian while my travel buddies shopped - one day of shopping is all I need in Bali :) During this walk I stopped at locations on the way to have a drink and a swim which was ok at each place except Double 6. I was going to have lunch there as well but was told the pool was only for guests (this may be the norm in many countries but in Bali it was quite unusual). There were many people around the pool but no-one in it! I decided to take my money next door to Cacoon and had a lovely swim, some tapas and a delicious cocktail. Probably wouldn't go back there with so many other options in Bali.

No ticket fee to access, only parking if we carry vehicles. And several music stage were ready to complete your time.

Content: As with all things Bali the staff were very accomodating and we were only visitors! My daughter and here young family were here for a week and had a lovely time.Despite the fact that the place was less than two years old, it could look a bit shabby in another year! There was rust and sticking doors, the Bintang was $6.50 in the room bar, so watch out for being fleeced! A good area for shopping and the pool is very nice.
review: thing bali staff accomodating visitor daughter young family week lovely timedespite fact place less two year old look bit shabby another year rust stick door bintang 650 room bar watch fleece good area shop pool nice

Content: Patrolled beach that is very safe. Double Six has beach chairs for guests with service from the hotel
review: patrol safe double six chair guest service hotel

Content: This beach sits at the end of a drain that runs directectly into the ocean..at times it can be very smelly and you really don't want to step in it let alone walk through it...they have now put up a little bridge to help with that but that rancid water runs straight into the ocean and where you swim...it's also very commercialised so loads of vendors asking you if you need a massage, sunglasses, sarong, jewlery etc..
review: sits end drain run directectly oceanat time smelly really dont want step let alone walk itthey now put little bridge help rancid water run straight ocean swimits commercialise load vendor ask need massage sunglasses sarong jewlery etc

Content: Good place to rent surfboards and learn how to surf! The beach is also close to a few nice restaurants and bars that have beanbags and an awesome vibe. Central and easy to find. Bit smelly though!
review: good place rent surfboard learn surf close nice restaurant bar beanbags awesome vibe central easy find bit smelly though

Content: I visited Double Six Beach on recommendation of our hotel's travel desk. The beach is nothing too great, there are several other beaches much better than Double Six Beach in Bali. I would recommend Semiyank Beach for sunset which is much cleaner.
review: visit double six recommendation hotel travel desk nothing great several beach much well double six bali recommend semiyank sunset much cleaner

Content: Went down to grab a board and have a go at surfing. Easy to grab a board and rash vest. Plenty of people learning to surf but wasn't overly crowded. Beach isn't the cleanest ever but plenty of room.
review: go grab board go surf easy grab board rash vest plenty people learn surf wasnt overly crowd isnt clean plenty room

Content: We only enjoyed the beach in the evenings. The seas were rough during our time as well. However to some degree, i frequent bondi beach and in my view this beach could not be compared. The sand isn't as good or golden however awesome to sit have few beers, enjoy live music and relax in the evening.
review: enjoy evening sea rough time well degree frequent bondi view compare sand isnt good golden awesome sit beer enjoy live music relax even

Content: good for children to play sand, running, we can't sit in a chair that pay 100 thousand rupiah within one or two hours , lovit
review: good child play sand run cant sit chair pay 100 thousand rupiah within one two hour lovit

Content: One of our favorite beach to walk and admire the sunset. We often take a slow walk from Petitenget Beach to Double Six Beach, the view was worth every step, didn't even get tired or bored. It was an amazing experience.
review: one favorite walk admire sunset often take slow walk petitenget double six view worth every step didnt even tire bore amazing experience

Content: Come down here for sunsets and drinks before dinnerrelaxed atmosphere and great to people watch,Bean bags on beach
review: come sunset drink dinnerrelaxed atmosphere great people watchbean bag

Content: Was an awesome experience having dinner by the beach with live band. Food n ambience was fantastic! They even offered a free ice cream sundae for my friend's bday celebration. Awesome! Memorable experience!
review: awesome experience dinner live band food n ambience fantastic even offer free ice cream sundae friend bday celebration awesome memorable experience

Content: This beach is very peculiar. The sand is blackish brown and super fine. You dont feel the grain of sands rubbing between your toes. It is almost like powder and on top of all this. There are no stones. Imagine that!  The roaring waves are a sight to see and they can be dangerous for kids. Just need to be careful and watch out for riptides.  During the high tide the waves actually reaches the stone walls and sometimes splashing against the side of the pubs.
review: peculiar sand blackish brown super fine dont feel grain sand rub toe almost powder top stone imagine roar wave sight see dangerous kid need careful watch riptide high tide wave actually reach stone wall sometimes splash side pub

Content: This place is buzzing from about 5pm onwards. All the small bars bring out bean bags onto the beach and serve food and drinks while you watch the sunset. There is music from live bands and DJ's. Definitely a must do at sunset while in Bali.
review: place buzz 5pm onwards small bar bring bean bag onto serve food drink watch sunset music live band dj definitely must sunset bali

Content: Highly over rated. Dirty beach, very ordinary cafe's / restaurants. Not worth the time. Glad we were not staying at one of the beach front hotels. If you want a clean beach go to Jimbaran or Nusa Dua. Even Legian was cleaner than this.
review: highly rat dirty ordinary cafe restaurant worth time glad stay one front hotel want clean go jimbaran nusa dua even legian cleaner

Content: This beach is crowded and unfortunately dirty. There's lots of litter and there was a certain smell I can't put my finger on. There were many beach vendors as well. The good thing about it is the many bars along the beach. If you prefer somewhere quieter and cleaner, I would suggest Seminyak beach, it's just a short distance away.
review: crowd unfortunately dirty there lot litter certain smell cant put finger many vendor well good thing many bar along prefer somewhere quiet clean suggest seminyak short distance away

Content: Very big waves, so have to be a bit careful but plenty life guards around. Rented two chairs with really nice cushion and umbrella for only IDR 50,000 (for the two). Ordered a cold drink and had a great afternoon!Beach does get crowded two hours before sunset but I kind of liked the buzz after a lazy afternoon.
review: big wave bite careful plenty life guard around rent two chair really nice cushion umbrella idr 50000 two order cold drink great afternoonbeach crowd two hour sunset kind like buzz lazy afternoon

Content: Stayed here last year and we are staying again this year for a couple of weeks. Great location, great food, our room was more if a suite and was beautiful and had a spectacular view over the ocean with a huge balcony. Close to lots of great Warungs and restaurants. Friendly staff

Content: We spent a sunset and a morning on the beach - we think better than Kuta and Legian as not as busy.  Good to hire a board and have a surf.

Content: The best place to enjoy sunset in Bali. Enjoying the beach because it was not crowded . A good place to relax

review: well good place long dont go 1st thing morning every morning thay need clean rubbish wash night ok will push buy allday lime lay seat pay park motoe bick pay lot smaill money

Content: We visited double six beach in May 2016 and found it to be clean with a very good surf. Their are resturants and bars attached to the rear of the beach and sun lounges and umbrellas are readily available.

Content: We went here to have dinner and for a quiet walk. This place is nice and numerous options available to have food. You may find many restaurants who have live bands playing for you. Beautifully decorated, it's nice!

Content: super cool place, nice soft seats, drinks, sunset time is the best! highly recommended! very clean also, and good for surfing too

Content: While staying at Horison Seminyak we visited the beach and loved its clear and clean water. Good for surfing

Content: Double six beach at Seminyak, Bali is th3 best spot to see sunset in Bali. Many people also held their romantic and memorable wedding ceremony at this beach. Highly recommended this beach for you to spend your holiday in Bali

Content: Great place to sit down on a beanbag and have a few beers while watching the sun go down. Beautiful beach.

Content: When you walk onto beach look to right and ask for Ozzie and Dee for your beds, table and umbrella. They are great young fellas and will look after you for drinks, alcoholic or otherwise and Ani for your fruit Jack for Henna tattoos and Ola for manicure and jewellrey. Lovely people have known them for years. The lady on the left does sensational Mee or Nasi Goreng for a pittance

Content: good hangout place with a lot of restaurants to choose from and with bands playing. Nice to watch the sunset here then have dinner around.

Content: The water was clean and the water was so warm. I could have stayed in the water all day.  I appreciated the leather beach chairs and the umbrellas that we rented for a cheap 100k Rupiah.

Content: A good start if you begin your trip in Bali. There are so many options to take surf lessons, rent chairs for the day, found some good restaurants and bars.Mixed of tourists and locals, especially if you have to assist to the sunrise, splendid and peaceful.Otherwise, it is surely not the most beautiful beach in Bali, but is also a nice place for kids.
review: good start begin trip bali many option take surf lesson rent chair day find good restaurant barsmixed tourist local especially assist sunrise splendid peacefulotherwise surely beautiful bali nice place kid

Content: for those who loves surfing, or just sitting around watching the waves chasing each other, or the magnificent sunset, this is the best hotel that I would recommend you to stay. The breakfast is not only made to order and artistically presented, the taste is really delicious. The hotel is very conveniently located for restaurants, bar and cafes. Shopping is good too, everything is within walking distance. The rooms are spacious and very well laid and the design of the hotel is neat, modern and yet artistic. So, YES I personally vouche
review: love surf sit around watch wave chase magnificent sunset best hotel recommend stay breakfast make order artistically present taste really delicious hotel conveniently locate restaurant bar cafe shop good everything within walk distance room spacious well laid design hotel neat modern yet artistic yes personally vouche

Content: This beach is pretty nice, not busy as kuta bech.. but lots of people selling everything( sometimes it is really annoying).. Great place for drinks, sunset, and chilling with friends. This place is a must go!
review: pretty nice busy kuta bech lot people sell everything sometimes really annoy great place drink sunset chill friend place must go

Content: Here is the best sunset spot in Bali. Most of the cafes around has similer concept with a colorful pillow as chair and it's beautiful!
review: best sunset spot bali cafe around similer concept colorful pillow chair beautiful

Content: We were greeted with smiles each morning and the staff really go above and beyond! We only stayed five nights but it really started to feel like a second home! We will most definitely return in the near future. Highly recommended

Content: Just for adult beach. Never bring your babies here...there are few gay club near it and most of those club visitor went to double six for sunbathing naked.

Content: Fantastic little cafes and restaurants along this beach makes it full of atmosphere.  Can sit back and have a drink, have a bite to eat, watch the kids in the water and then watch the sunset.  After dark most of the beach Cafes have entertainment.  A must do while in Bali!!
review: fantastic little cafe restaurant along make full atmosphere sit back drink bite eat watch kid water watch sunset dark cafes entertainment must bali

Content: Visited in May and unlike other reviews in April we found the beach to be clean of rubbish and the water to be clear like in Australia. Obviously May is a very quiet time in Bali  and our preferred time to visit. The prices are cheaper as everyone is trying to get your business. Highly recommended place to stay in May.
review: visit may unlike review april find clean rubbish water clear australia obviously may quiet time bali preferred time visit price cheap everyone try business highly recommended place stay may

Content: great little bars and restaurants all along the beach, can walk to kuta or echo beach on the sand or paved walkways
review: great little bar restaurant along walk kuta echo sand pave walkway

Content: If only the beach was kept clean it would make a huge difference, and that goes for the general area around Legian/Seminyak. There was a lot of rubbish and not enough bins. I did notice locals dumping their rubbish - this is a real shame as it real spoils the landscape and tourists complain. Local authorities need to take action and enforce penalties. Bali is a great place to visit but they need to clean up their act otherwise people won't return.
review: kept clean make huge difference go general area around legianseminyak lot rubbish enough bin notice local dump rubbish real shame real spoil landscape tourist complain local authority need take action enforce penalty bali great place visit need clean act people wont return

Content: I would recommend this restaurant for breakfast.The set menu is good value and for a healthy start the fruit with granola is my choice.I am sure that lunch and dinners would be of the same standard although as we do not live that closeWe usually make it our Sunday morning favourite to catch up with friends.
review: recommend restaurant breakfastthe set menu good value healthy start fruit granola choicei sure lunch dinner standard although live closewe usually make sunday morning favourite catch friend

Content: A nice wide beach , hot sand but plenty of beach bars to cool off in. Ideal to watch the sunset but gets a little busy
review: nice wide hot sand plenty bar cool ideal watch sunset get little busy

Content: Dirty beach with lots of rubbish. Rough/choppy surf which I wouldn't go into unless I was a strong swimmer, wouldn't allow my children to go in. There are red and yellow flags to indicate safe areas to swim but the life savers don't appear to take their job seriously so it is a bit of a gamble if you aren't confident in strong surf. If you're looking for a nice beach go down south to uluwatu and nusa dewa. I did go for drinks at sunset a few nights though and it was very nice to see the sun set over the water while listening to live music. Also please not in Australian so I'm very used to beautiful beaches!

Content: We forced ourselves to see the sun rise rather than sleep in. Definitely worth it to join all the many others along the beach. It is much nicer than we thought and gets the cobwebs out of the way in preparation for the day. Time to sleep later
review: force see sun rise rather sleep definitely worth join many others along much nicer think get cobwebs way preparation day time sleep later

Content: Thanks to Harris Seminyak Hotel that gives facility to us so we can go to Double Six Beach. Harris Hotel gives us facility in the form of shuttle bus and shedi.We love the beach. My 6 year old cousin also enjoy it. The wave is good, many surfer come here. Love it

Content: Great for a nice sunset, and a bite to eat. Recommend going to Coccon beach club for the two for one cocktails then walking down the beach for the sunset :)

Content: The Double Six beach is a perfect getaway to relax under an umbrella and have a couple of drinks , the waves are medium and the beach is clean just beware of the scammers at the entrance of the beach telling you that you have won a complementary prize , also there are many people trying to sell you stuff on the beach itself.Would return again
review: double six perfect getaway relax umbrella couple drink wave medium clean beware scammer entrance tell win complementary prize many people try sell stuff itselfwould return

Content: One of my favourite beaches for beach bars, catching up with friends and watching the stunning sunsets
review: one favourite beach bar catch friend watch stunning sunset

Content: got a room on ground floor next to pool and great ocean views. everything as described in web picture. the staff were incredibly professional and polite and well trained. breakfast was amazing as was dinner at the 4th floor restaurant. Best service we've had in a long time! highly recommended
review: get room ground floor next pool great ocean view everything describe web picture staff incredibly professional polite well trained breakfast amazing dinner 4th floor restaurant best service weve long time highly recommend

Content: An amazing looking hotel resort with a lagoon pool.We stopped in for a cocktail each which was reasonable priced at $13
review: amaze look hotel resort lagoon poolwe stop cocktail reasonable price 13

Content: not the most spectacular of beaches nor the prettiest but since its there and i was staying near by so thought would pay a visit but its something you would do once and not again
review: spectacular beach prettiest stay near think pay visit something

Content: Ok so firstly we had fun here, hired 3 day beds, surf boards for the kids and had a few drinks on the beach. What did I learn,1. Ask advise from others who look like they have been here before... I did and saved me some $$ 2. Day beds, don't pay over 50k for 1, they will also try and put a time limit on you? Just say no this is for as long as I want. 3. Drinks, I wandered up to a bar and paid full price for drinks first up, watching others I found the guy who rented you the bed will also being you drinks at a cheaper price than the bars. 4. When hiring a surfboard haggle (as with everything else in Bali.. Also don't fall for the 'you have to have lessons to hire this board' if you can surf just say no if will cost you far less. 5. Expect hawkers, you will have people come try to sell you bits and pieces. If your not interested let them know and they will move on. 6. Have fun!! Your in Bali for crying out loud!!
review: ok firstly fun hire 3 day bed surf board kid drink learn1 ask advise others look saved 2 day bed dont pay 50k 1 will try put time limit say long want 3 drink wander bar pay full price drink first watch others find guy rent bed will drink cheap price bar 4 hire surfboard haggle everything bali dont fall lesson hire board surf say will cost far less 5 expect hawker will people come try sell bit piece interested let know will move 6 fun bali cry loud

Content: We stayed at the Double-Six hotel and loved this beach every day. It is simply stunning with very nice places to drink, eat and lounge.
review: stay doublesix hotel love every day simply stun nice place drink eat lounge

Content: Having traveled the world this beach is nothing that will take your breath away. One of the most crowded beaches in Bali and not known for its beauty.Ideal for beginner surfers to get their lessons. Not very peaceful as you will be approached by a storm of beach boys and other vendors trying to sell you their products and services. Better to go to Uluwatu, Nusa Dua, Amed, Gianyar, Canggu etc.
review: traveled world nothing will take breath away one crowd beach bali know beautyideal beginner surfer lesson peaceful will approach storm boys vendor try sell product service well go uluwatu nusa dua amed gianyar canggu etc

Content: We still love a beer on the beach, we always sit at Aussies bar it's just fun.  We do our souvenir shopping for the kids while we have a beer, massage and buy our fruit.You have to be prepared to be swarmed by the hawkers and be able to get rid of those you don't want to buy from- my method is be really nice and have fun with them but be up front and let them know right away that you're not interested and if you tell them you are then you should buy it from them and not waste their time arguing over 50 cents.  We get the cheapest prices on the beach and the fruit is always fresh and fabulous. It's important to remember this is whats done on the beaches in Bali, you can't be rude to these guys this is just what they do.Its a fun place to meet other travelers and have a chat, share experiences and make plans.Always worth a sit down for a icey cold drink . :-)
review: still love beer always sit aussie bar fun souvenir shopping kid beer massage buy fruityou prepare swarm hawker able rid dont want buy method really nice fun front let know right away youre interested tell buy waste time argue 50 cent cheap price fruit always fresh fabulous important remember whats do beach bali cant rude guy doits fun place meet traveler chat share experience make plansalways worth sit icey cold drink

Content: My name is George Hondris and I recently took my 3 children and there kids to The Double Six. What an experience. All staff from the General Manager down to the pool staff were fantastic. Nothing was too much trouble and we shared 3 bithdays up there and have unforgetable memories that we have taken home regarding this modern State of the Art Hotel.We will be back in September and cant wait. Content: If you're looking for a beach for eating, drinking, live music and some sheesha, this is the place to be..there are plenty of shacks with bean bags that are usually on till 11 PM. Tried other beaches such as seminyak Legian and Kuta..which are otherwise great beaches but only till sunset.

Content: We visited this beach after dinner, so it's a bit late for sunset viewings, but the ambiance was never a letdown. Definitely the place if you plan to go night-talking for 2-3 hours to go.

Content: Stunning beach, amazing sunsets - great location. We spent a number of evenings on the beach, watching the sun go down - I guarantee you will get some amazing pictures. You will never get bored of sunsets like this. Great bars along the beach, with live music. I would 100% recommend spending the later afternoon and evening here.!

Content: My husband and I spent a day here and hired 2 day beds with a surfboard for quite cheap. The weather was lovely so it was a nice day and really fun for surfing with a longboard but the amount of people walking along selling you things got a little bit annoying. Some would stop for a good amount of time and just stand in front of you even when you were saying no. Apart from that a nice morning on the beach
review: husband spend day hire 2 day bed surfboard quite cheap weather lovely nice day really fun surf longboard amount people walk along sell thing get little bit annoy stop good amount time stand front even say apart nice morning

Content: We spent a couple of days on Double Six Beach across from the Seaside Mexican restaurant in the Gay-friendly section of the beach.  Look for the small rainbow flag on a poll.  The guys who work on the beach are friendly and attentive.  They moved chairs and umbrellas to make sure everyone in our party was comfortable and fed.  Nothing beats a day on the beach with seaside food and drink service.  Just be sure to wear your sandals, because the sand can be as hot as burning coals.
review: spent couple day double six across seaside mexican restaurant gayfriendly section look small rainbow flag poll guy work friendly attentive move chair umbrella make sure everyone party comfortable fed nothing beat day seaside food drink service sure wear sandal sand hot burning coal

Content: Sunset, Beach, Acoustic. Perfect Harmony. Love this beach! My favorit beach spot while i'm in Bali. Only need to take a walk for 10-30 minutes from hotels around Seminyak area.But, hey, where is the Caesar Palace? one of the good cafe in Double Six, replaced by D'Joglo when my last visit.
review: sunset acoustic perfect harmony love favorit spot im bali need take walk 1030 minute hotels around seminyak areabut hey caesar palace one good cafe double six replace djoglo last visit

Content: White shandy beach, perfect for sun bath & surf. It's only 10 minutes drive from our accommodation Hotel Ibis Styles Bali Petitenget.
review: white shandy perfect sun bath surf 10 minute drive accommodation hotel ibis style bali petitenget

Content: A mediocre beach - not very clean, full of hawkers and hassling sun lounger reps. Lard and tattoos everywhere. Not for me.
review: mediocre clean full hawker hassle sun lounger reps lard tattoo everywhere

Content: The beaches (water quality, sand, etc.) from Kuta to  Seminyak are quite dirty. Open sewers floating into the water, garbage galore both in the water and on the beach. If you're looking for light colored sand, clean crystal water, this side of Bali is not where you  will find it. Up and down the beach, you can take surf lessons, rent boards, rent an umbrella and loung chair. And by 5pm or so, the bean bag chairs are pulled out (free to use) and the party atmosphere begins. People playing soccer, music, lights, etc. We found the apres sunset scene to be a lot of fun. During the south swell season, stays offshore until about 10-11am and there's thumping head high ++ beach break...though pretty much walled except for the odd corner/shoulder that forms near the channels. But again, the water is bordering on filthy, disgusting at most spots.
review: beach water quality sand etc kuta seminyak quite dirty open sewer float water garbage galore water youre look light color sand clean crystal water side bali will find take surf lesson rent board rent umbrella loung chair 5pm bean bag chair pull free use party atmosphere begin people play soccer music light etc find apres sunset scene lot fun south swell season stay offshore 1011am there thump head high breakthough pretty much wall except odd cornershoulder form near channel water border filthy disgust spot

Content: I have been to this beach 5 years ago. it was ok but not too crowed. last week i have been to Seminyak again so i went to Double six beach to see the sunset. i think like most people said already this beach is nothing special, sea is not beautiful as blue one. if you travel already other seas like Gili island or Phiphi island, please dont expect a beautiful water here. its a beach not very clean even. only thing is the sunset is ok. or if you want to hang out with some friends to have drink in the bars on the beach. otherwise no nothing special here.
review: 5 year ago ok crow last week seminyak go double six see sunset think people say already nothing special sea beautiful blue one travel already seas gili island phiphi island please dont expect beautiful water clean even thing sunset ok want hang friends drink bar nothing special

Content: Close to everything Seminyak has to offer. We stayed in the 1 bedroom pool Villa and the facilities were 5 star.
review: close everything seminyak offer stay 1 bedroom pool villa facility 5 star

Content: Love this part of the beach as has what ever u want from manicures, massages, food, drinks and u dont even have to move from your beach chair
review: love part u want manicure massage food drink u dont even move chair

Content: This beach was extremely clean and is perfect for enjoying the sunset.  The beach is not too busy and offers the opportunity to surf or sit and eat/ drink.
review: extremely clean perfect enjoy sunset busy offer opportunity surf sit eat drink

Content: If you're after a more quiet less busy beach close to Kuta/Seminyak this would be a good choice.The mostly clean and off white sandy beach offers calm waves and a few activities during the day such as horse riding, surfing lessons.At night there is some nightlife but I preferred Seminyak beach for nightlife more.
review: youre quiet less busy close kutaseminyak good choicethe mostly clean white sandy offer calm wave activity day horse rid surf lessonsat night nightlife prefer seminyak nightlife

Content: Located in Legian, bit quieter than Kuta. Good place to walk in the morning without having direct sunlight (West coast of Bali)
review: locate legian bit quiet kuta good place walk morning without direct sunlight west coast bali

Content: The beach is not as busy as Kuta.. Much cleaner with some nice waves too.Only around 10 minutes from kuta and seminyak.
review: busy kuta much clean nice wave tooonly around 10 minute kuta seminyak

Content: Great to watch the local Bali kids playing beach games and the dogs playing in the water. Love the colourful bean bags and cold beers and cocktails whilst checking out the wares of the street traders.
review: great watch local bali kid play game dog play water love colourful bean bag cold beer cocktails whilst checking ware street trader

Content: Double six is in a great location for those wanting to experience the real Seminyak atmosphere and night life. The service was excellent and I felt comfortable the entire stay. However the only down side was that my room had a few issues with lighting and technology not working - in saying that the butler had an engineer on site quickly and it was remediated quickly. would recommend for people wanting to experience great hospitality in Seminyak.
review: double six great location want experience real seminyak atmosphere night life service excellent felt comfortable entire stay side room issue light technology work say butler engineer site quickly remediate quickly recommend people want experience great hospitality seminyak

Content: The stylish location has a great vibe. You can book a sunken lounge, but phone at least a day ahead. 1mil minimum spend on food/drink for a sunken lounge booking. Also, make yourself aware of the dress code or you won't be admitted. Various food options avaible, finger food in your lounge, or an Italian meal down stairs in the resturant.
review: stylish location great vibe book sunken lounge phone least day ahead 1mil minimum spend fooddrink sink lounge book make aware dress code wont admit various food option avaible finger food lounge italian meal stair resturant

Content: We went to one of the many beach bars with chairs on the beach, and even on a quite cloudy day the mood is fantastic. The beach itself is quite shallow, but there can be waves depending on the wind direction. The beach is wide well suited for children.
review: go one many bar chair even quite cloudy day mood fantastic quite shallow wave depend wind direction wide well suited child

Content: The Double Six beach is a very clean beach along that stretch of Bali's coastline that extends from beaches at Kuta to Seminyak.Given that it's the tropics, the sun can be unforgiving during the day and you will need to grab a seat with the shade of an umbrella. You do get a beautiful view of the sunset from the beach. For those interested, the beach makes a very good vantage point to watch flights land / take off at / from the Ngurah Rai Denpasar Bali Airport every few minutes.There are a large number of shacks and small restaurants serving through the day and hawkers will be around everywhere you look trying to sell their wares. One might think of that as a problem, but they don't trouble you much if you've said a firm 'no'.The evenings see a rise in the crowd - locals and foreigners alike. You will see people trying to surf on the waves, play a game of football on the beach, take walks alone / with their dogs, and just doing a wide variety of activity all along the beach. On the whole, it's a wonderful place to relax for a few hours in Bali.
review: double six clean along stretch bali coastline extend beach kuta seminyakgiven tropic sun unforgiving day will need grab seat shade umbrella beautiful view sunset interested make good vantage point watch flight land take ngurah rai denpasar bali airport every minutesthere large number shack small restaurant serve day hawker will around everywhere look try sell ware one might think problem dont trouble much youve say firm nothe evening see rise crowd local foreigner alike will see people try surf wave play game football take walk alone dog wide variety activity along whole wonderful place relax hour bali

Content: Love to just lay around relaxing in the sun just watching the day go by not a care in the world , the way a holiday should Be . Yes there is hawkers everywhere but that's Bali love it or hate it they are just doing there job.
review: love lay around relax sun watching day go care world way holiday yes hawker everywhere thats bali love hate job

Content: Bali's west coast has no shortage of beach spots. In fact, it's almost one endless beach strip for kilometers on end. However, of course, every area has it's own charm.For me, Double Six Beach is one of the best spots on the Island. One of the particular features is an abundance of nice beach bars which are especially great for sunset drinks, most of them equipped with bean bags for comfy seating, some of them have DJs, others live music. It's a very lively scene and there is a huge selection of excellent restaurants and beach clubs in the surrounding Seminyak neighborhood.Like in many other places, there are lots of surf schools around - its a good wave!All in all, perfect spot for sunset drinks and chill-out at the beach, a good win or surf - anything goes...
review: bali west coast shortage spot fact almost one endless strip kilometer end course every area charmfor double six one best spot island one particular feature abundance nice bar especially great sunset drink equip bean bag comfy seat dj others live music lively scene huge selection excellent restaurant club surround seminyak neighborhoodlike many place lot surf school around good waveall perfect spot sunset drink chillout good win surf anything go

Content: Tekor Bali on the beach frount at Double six is a great place to eat at sunset great for fish and chips plus Arak Madus
review: tekor bali frount double six great place eat sunset great fish chip plus arak madus

Content: Our Villa was only 400 meters to the beach. went there everyday to watch the sunset and have some drinks with friends. Great beach for surfing and swimming. The water was very warm. You have beach chairs and  umbrellas to watch the night away with plenty of music and live bands. Excdellent
review: villa 400 meter go everyday watch sunset drink friends great surf swimming water warm chair umbrellas watch night away plenty music live band excdellent

Content: A beautiful beach with colours and a great sunset to unwind with cold beers or cocktails. Can be a perfect romantic evening with your loved one or just a great bonding time with friends! This place is a must go!

Content: Again I was a little disappointed at double six beach when I visited it had rubbish strewn all over, there was a tractor attempting to clean but it just seemed to be moving sand, I prefer to head up to Legian beach where why there is some mess locals seem to clean up a lot

Content: Great from spending the day at the beach to sunset drinks and dinner. Great music. A great pop in or you can stay all night.

Content: My wife and I enjoyed a couple of meals and some afternoon drinks  while watching the great sunsets. only problem is the overly loud music coming from Cocoon which spoilt the music from beach performers.

Content: Love the cafes on the beach front. Perfect for lazing the days away. Particularly breathtaking at night. A million times better than Kuta! Clean an beautiful beach!

Content: Beautiful beach, very popular with beach games and lots of mainly young people. Security guards are very evident plus the food was good and reasonably priced.

Content: Clean place and you can enjoy swimming and surfing in the beach with quiete friendly wave :D :D .. good place to enjoy the sunset "when is not cloudy :D

Content: We were SO disappointed with this beach. We were in Seminyak for 4 days hoping to surf and play in the water and we didn't dip a toe in once. Bulldozers would clean the beaches of garbage every morning, and it would continue to wash up all day. Truly disgusting and so sad. We've been to Kuta and Legian before and had never seen anything like this. We were told it comes on the tides from Java...

Content: A stone's throw away from our hotel, this beach had beige grayish sand and was therefore, not too cool on bare feet. Still, our stay under the umbrella shades was quite relaxing.  Huge waves most enjoyable for surfers and for those who just like to ride on the waves!

Content: Fortunately our hotel had a private area which allowed us to sun -bake comfortably.  That was the only highlight.The beach was riddled with plastic, paper and unmentionables.A drain was free-flowing into the sea causing brown waves that put most people off. Putting up with the beach vendors wasn't too bad, given that this is their only form of income.This beach is not somewhere I would advise anybody to swim at!

Content: This beach is beautiful and particularly gorgeous in the evening when the sun is setting.  Very nice also in the mornings for a nice walk.

Content: awesome selection of restaraunts and bars! Great place to unwind and relax in Seminyak!  Family friendly location

Content: We arrived in the late afternoon in an effort to escape the hot sun. The most beautiful sunset was presented to us by nature.

Content: Great beach with perfect sunsets. Each area could try and clean up the rubbish that collects on the beach. some areas do a great job while others not so good.

Content: We have visited this beach are now twice in the last three months, staying for a week on both occassions.  The last time it was clear that the local authoritiy were struggling to keep the sand clean.  However I am more concerned that the water quality is very poor which is a real shame as the surf can be pretty good.  The open drain outlets appear to run directly into the sea, along the whole lenght of the beach.  I suspect this is a health issue (serious).  I would love to be told told otherwise.

Content: Take your pick on dining and drinking locations along here. There are plenty. A great spot to watch the sunsets and grab a nice light meal whilst laying in a bean bag on the beach itself under a lamp-lit beach umbrella with hundreds of others surrounding you and your friends.Life is good when you take a moment and absorb where you are!

Content: East access down a narrow lane, not crowded with clean white sand and safe sea.  Less packed than some of the other beaches.

Content: Nice place for having such a relax time and hanging out with friends. The sands was quite clean but there are some dogs around the beach. Good waves for surfers.

Content: The food options on this side of Seminyak beach are more international from tacos to pork ribs. However the beach itself is nosier and not as clean. Just take a walk down to Legian and both the ocean and beach will satisfy your vacation needs better.

Content: We came here to do some surfing. It's excellent for all levels, but be careful of the rips and pull of the water. Very strong, but fantastic time spent surfing. Lots of sun loungers, surf board rental places, bars etc.

Content: DS beach is a great way to end your hectic day or meet up with friends after a long day of riding around on your bike!  There are a variety of simple places to hang out sit on  a bean bag with friends (or alone ) on the beach to watch the beautiful Bali sunset! this is what life is all about !
review: ds great way end hectic day meet friend long day rid around bike variety simple place hang sit bean bag friend alone watch beautiful bali sunset life

Content: We walked  about a couple of k's from where we were staying to this beach as it was cleaner by far than Jepun Beach the sand was not as black either and more bars/restaurant's to chose from. We went in 10/2/16 a festival day in the Balinese calender and so many Balinese were leaving offerings along the beach which really added to the litter already strewn along the shore, we even saw a dead half buried chicken! It would be great if the Balinese could get onto the rubbish problem in general, when it rains the drains all block and results in flooding too. We were  told a lit of the rubbish on the beach cones from the PHILLIPINES??

Content: Depressing , filthy, proof that tourism destroys culture.nit should be a call to arms to have proper recycling in Bali and that each hotel should have a plan in place. It is a floating garbage can.

Content: Every time I come to Bali I spend most evenings on the beach to watch the sunset.There is always something happening, Sports / WeddingsMany bars that have cold drinks, food & live musicI love grabbing a bean bag and just chilling for a few hours before heading off on a big night

Content: On our last day of our stay in Bali we headed down to the beach where our hotel had a beach club (basically chairs, towels and umbrellas). At first glance the beach is beautiful with a few restaurant/bar options. What we found as we went for a swim was the sand and the water inundated with rubbish, mainly plastic. We did have a big storm yesterday with loads of rain so I am not sure if the rubbish problem is exacerbated by stormwater discharge into the ocean which is likely. The black beach sand is like mud when wet and sticks to everything. We left shortly after and headed back to our hotel pool.

Content: The beach is beautiful at sunset and the Balianese at sunrise send the cleaning machines in to clean up all the debris that has been left behind or floated in. This beach is nice and wide and great for wandering along or going for a run.

Content: Maybe because it's Sunday so it was full of people. The beach is looking better & more clean compare to Kuta beach. Mostly local people or local tourist. It has comfy seating area in many cafes at the beachside with live accoustic band performance when we're seeing sunset. Lovely time!

Content: There are many shops here along the beach selling food and drinks. There are peddlers around selling from steam peanuts to kites. Stalls here set up lounge chairs and umbrellas by the beach for patrons to sit and chill. Waves were not to big but there were a few people surfing. It was a nice place to just chill with friends drinking coconut juice and watch the sunset.
review: many shop along sell food drink peddler around sell steam peanut kit stall set lounge chair umbrellas patron sit chill wave big people surf nice place chill friends drink coconut juice watch sunset

Content: This beach reminds me of the ones back home in California. Except for one fact, the waves here are HUGE. Perfect beach to catch some surfing or boogie boarding. They have so many people renting out surfboards and boogie boards for a reasonable price. You can even get a surf lesson from the locals. Plenty of bars along the beach, no way you'd get hungry. There's lots of cute stray dogs walking around. There are many hagglers who will offer you some pretty cool trinkets. They're not too pushy. Just expect it everywhere you go. Remember they're human and just trying to support their families is all.

Content: Kuta Beach is just way too crowded and way too many pushy hagglers. The people in Double Six beach are nicer and most of the sellers are not too pushy and more polite, but you have to negotiate your way for lower prices even though they're offering prices lower than Kuta Beach. Still, you can definitely R&R in this beach. Good for couples as this beach is one of the popular dating spot in Bali. In the evening the beach gets more crowded by locals and families and dogs, and you can move to one of the bean bags at the seaside cafe and watch the sunset with live music and margarita.

There is also live band in front at the beach, where one can relax at the beanbags with a beer in hand, a pizza and enjoy the sunset. Woah...Went into the sea and enjoy the waves at you. There are rental of surf boards available. Overall good relaxing experience...

Content: We stopped off at the Blue 9 Beach bar and it was a lovely relaxing way to spend a quiet afternoon after a whole day of sightseeing.They were setting up the speakers for a night of entertainment and unfortunately we didn't stay long enough to enjoy but we got there at a good time in the afternoon to secure seats as I am sure it would pack up quickly.  The bean bags are uncomfortable though so some new biggers one wouldn't go astray.  We did sit at a table also but for an evening with cocktails to take in the evening entertainment you need to be on the bean bags!Good and friendly service.  We ordered a chicken pizza which literally had one small piece of chicken on each slice and the crust was tough.  Go for the drinks and environment not necessarily the pizza.

Content: We were here in July - and it was beautiful.  Came back in December and it was almost knee-deep in rubbish.  Just disgusting.  The Balinese claim that it's a naturally occurring seasonal event (there's a sign on the beach to this effect).  More like rubbish being washed down with the rains.  Such a shame as it is a beautiful beach - it would be good if they could do something about it.
review: july beautiful come back december almost kneedeep rubbish disgust balinese claim naturally occur seasonal event there sign effect rubbish wash rain shame beautiful good something

Content: Really comfy sunbeds for 50k. Not the cleanest beach in the world, but in general people don't know what to do with rubbish in Bali. Many locals come after 5pm (when it is less hot) to enjoy the beach and watch the sunset. Many hagglers trying to sell you stuff - just pretend you're sleeping!!!
review: really comfy sunbeds 50k clean world general people dont know rubbish bali many local come 5pm less hot enjoy watch sunset many haggler try sell stuff pretend youre sleep

Content: The view of the sunset from here was awesome! It wasn't heavily crowded when I got there but the place tends to be crowded at times, nevertheless it's a great place to be. Content: This beach is considered as one of the most famous and most visited in Bali, the reason being is that the beach has a long stretch and wide stone-coloured soft-sandy beach.A famous bakso (meat balls - local streetfood) stall by the name "gerobak biru" just across Kumala Pantai Hotel is a must-have items while enjoying the sunset over there.

Content: It may have been because of the rainy season but when you walked into the water you could feel and see so mush rubbish floating around - the water was lovely and warm but we couldn't go into it - we know that the locals do their best to keep it clean but it just keeps washing up - the water further north of 66 beach is a lot cleaner and clearer

Content: Great views of the beach and sunset, free entry so great just to go and have a look around. Had a wallet stolen on NYE and staff went above and beyond to get it back. Bar service however was terrible, one girl on the til so 45min waits, hopefully it was just a NYE issue.

Content: A perfect beach for watching the romantic sunset while you enjoy a cold beer in their cafes. For my teens they crazy for surfing all day time. In night you could enjoy the live music in each cafe with ur fam or friends.

review: amazing sunsetnice beanbag sun sand sea wave kid play soccer vendor sell sky lantern fireworks singer expensive abit dirty yes sunset alone worth visit

Content: The vibe here was magical.  Wonderful beach; pretty clean, great temperature, hari krishnas dancing up the sand with santa clause hats on, great food.  Just go.

Content: This is really nice beach ,,' the bar cal is cocon beach club ,,'end also nice to do surfing lesson i have been there with my Frend from Australia he his very like beach
review: really nice bar cal cocon club end nice surf lesson frend australia

Content: the beach with a lot of sunset cafe, very crowded for enjoy the sea and sun. but little bit dirty. loves to morning run at the beach, and doing a good time with buddies.

Content: Between the plastic bags and other rubbish in the water and on the sand the illusion of a paradise island was quickly shattered. It was really disappointing upon arrival to the point my partner didn't want to take a seat on the sand for a little while (after a 25 minutes walk under the blazing sun and suffocating heat).Saw a surfer coming out of the water with the southern cross tattooed on his shoulder (Aussie mark), asked him how good was the water and replied "got it going for a bit, then lost it when three plastic bags got tangled to my leg, right now I am going to wash the frustration it down"
review: plastic bag rubbish water sand illusion paradise island quickly shatter really disappointing upon arrival point partner didnt want take seat sand little 25 minute walk blaze sun suffocate heatsaw surfer come water southern cross tattooed shoulder aussie mark ask good water reply get go bit lose three plastic bag get tangled leg right now go wash frustration

Content: the place is at good location. nice hotel. we just went to chill out. view from the roof top was spectacular just like place. visit it once and have a drink. only veg food option was potato wades/fries.
review: place good location nice hotel go chill view roof top spectacular place visit drink veg food option potato wadesfries

Content: Visitors have trashed the place, sadly. Great surf and board rentals, lessons are cheap and plentiful.
review: visitor trash place sadly great surf board rental lesson cheap plentiful

Content: We have swum at Double Six Beach for numerous days and the first day was fabulous, but then there was a bit of rain and the next day the beach was covered in rubbish , on the beach, in the water. We returned a few days later and still rubbish, then it seemed to improve. Apart from the rubbish the beach was good.
review: swum double six numerous day first day fabulous bit rain next day cover rubbish water return day later still rubbish seem improve apart rubbish good

Content: Sorry but I am tired of saying no to vendors who do not listen and continue to harass me and others who are just trying to relax on the beach and enjoy a Bintang.
review: sorry tire say vendor listen continue harass others try relax enjoy bintang

Content: We visited the beach 5 days before Christmas and had to sit on sun loungers a few feet away from a tide of trash that had washed up on the sands. People were having to walk amongst it and over it to get to the sea. It was absolutely filthy and stretched right along the beach. I can't believe this is one of the main attractions of the area. I see that other people have left very good reviews so I imagine the beach must be cleaned at certain times of year. I won't be recommending this to anyone I'm afraid.
review: visited 5 day christmas sit sun lounger foot away tide trash wash sand people walk amongst sea absolutely filthy stretch right along cant believe one main attraction area see people leave good review imagine must clean certain time year wont recommend anyone im afraid

Content: Very nice beach, full of fun and peace. Nice location. 24*7 shop is there for everything you need. must visit
review: nice full fun peace nice location 247 shop everything need must visit

Content: Nice beach for afternoon drinks or food. Definitely not the golden sands of our Australian beaches, but great for a refreshing dip with the added character of beach bars. The street hawkers are there but very polite and no hard sell. Beautiful sunsets.
review: nice afternoon drink food definitely golden sand australian beach great refresh dip add character bar street hawker polite hard sell beautiful sunset

Content: Surf Lesson, Surf Photography, Surf Trip.Enjoy the waves in Double Six Beach.. With our surf instructor and ride your wave, we will capture your moment stand up on surfboard.

Content: Nice view but too crowded. I prefer quiet beach where i can enjoy the space, the ambience and admire the sea.
review: nice view crowd prefer quiet enjoy space ambience admire sea

Content: When you visit Double six beach be sure to stay for a drink a dusk. They set up bean bags and tables on the shore and you can enjoy a drink whilst watching the ocean and people watching. The guys that look after you are amazing and only too happy to look after your needs. Most of the cafes and restaurants serve great cheap food.
review: visit double six sure stay drink dusk set bean bag table shore enjoy drink whilst watch ocean people watch guys look amaze happy look need cafes restaurant serve great cheap food

Content: fun and atmosphere great. close to lots of drinks and food. Massages and the water. can rent sunlounge at a reasonable rate
review: fun atmosphere great close lot drink food massage water rent sunlounge reasonable rate

Content: There is loads of things to do on this beach and it would be a good beach to learn surfing on for the beginner.
review: load thing good learn surf beginner

Content: Double Six beach was just a short walk away from where we stayed in Seminyak. The beach is clean & flat and the waves just right to have fun with. There were red flags at parts indicating strong undercurrents. The beach had vendors all along renting out sundeck chairs and umbrellas. We didn't opt for these as it was already nearing sunset. Local Kids playing football made a refreshing sight - and you could join in if you wish to. The beach is lined with a variety of restaurants - with almost all having a podium in front with the back facing the sea, and good singers crooning out popular pop numbers. The lane just adjacent yo the beach too had several nice eateries. A great night life spot in Seminyak.
review: double six short walk away stay seminyak clean flat wave right fun red flag part indicate strong undercurrent vendor along rent sundeck chair umbrellas didnt opt already nearing sunset local kid play football make refresh sight join wish line variety restaurant almost podium front back face sea good singer croon popular pop number lane adjacent yo several nice eatery great night life spot seminyak

Content: nice place just relax on the beach and get full sun shine or get swim on the beach  or you could go for surfing , just nice in seminyak beach.
review: nice place relax full sun shine swim go surf nice seminyak

Content: This is the best Bar/restaurant on the beach, best time to be there is around sun set. Its one of the places you must visit during your stay in Bali.
review: best barrestaurant best time around sun set one place must visit stay bali

Content: Been here a couple of times. Its a nice beach, plenty of places to eat from cheap to expensive. Hawkers offer to sell you things, just politely say no and they move on. Not to big a surf. Family friendly
review: couple time nice plenty place eat cheap expensive hawker offer sell thing politely say move big surf family friendly

Content: Great beach with large sand breaks. Plenty of places to eat along beach, board hire and hawkers. One can even ride horses on this beach.
review: great large sand break plenty place eat along board hire hawkers one even ride horse

Content: First the location is incredible, lots of people, great flat beach and easy to go in the sea to play with the waves...(not the cases on all beaches). We rented body surf board for 50.000 rp the hour, quite alright but the sundeck chairs with umbrella are ridiculously expensive, after bargaining really hard we got 3 chairs for 200.000 rp, it was already 2 .30pm went we showed up and at 4.30pm she asked us to leave as the bar adjacent was setting up for the cocktail hours...total rip off. Next time I will go a little further away. Excellent location to listen to music and enjoy the sunset !!
review: first location incredible lots people great flat easy go sea play wavesnot case beach rent body surf board 50000 rp hour quite alright sundeck chair umbrella ridiculously expensive bargaining really hard get 3 chair 200000 rp already 2 30pm go show 430pm ask u leave bar adjacent set cocktail hourstotal rip next time will go little away excellent location listen music enjoy sunset

Content: Don't be put off by persons selling paintings, I bought three for approx 25 pound and was offered 150 each on my return to UK ! A lovely beach and setting highly recommended
review: dont put person sell painting buy three approx 25 pound offer 150 return uk lovely set highly recommend

Content: I went down for a walk to double six beach for a look one morning, and I was quite impressed on the cleanliness of the beach, beautiful sand lounge chairs everywhere a few people trying to sell bracelets etc.. Despite that a great place to come for the day
review: go walk double six look one morning quite impressed cleanliness beautiful sand lounge chair everywhere people try sell bracelet etc despite great place come day

Content: Easy day on the beach - reasonably priced sun lounges with good drink service Water was perfect temperatureAlso great for a long jog along the beach
review: easy day reasonably price sun lounge good drink service water perfect temperaturealso great long jog along

Content: This beach is famous  for its long stretch of clean beach.  Centrally located, it can be reached on foot . Popular with foreigners and tourists.
review: famous long stretch clean centrally locate reached foot popular foreigner tourist

Content: More better then kuta beach...you sould visited..and on this beach there is cafe/restaurant for chill out with live music when sunset comes..
review: well kuta beachyou sould visitedand caferestaurant chill live music sunset come

Content: Nothing special really. Check it out if you'd like but there's nicer beaches further north. Lots of rubbish washes up at nighttime.
review: nothing special really check youd there nicer beach north lot rubbish wash nighttime

Content: We just went to the bar!  Fabulous view.  Very modern and cool bar!  Wonderful mojitos!!  We went on a Tuesday night 2  for 1 prices!! Dangerous!!  Also BEST EVER popcorn chicken.  Delicious!
review: go bar fabulous view modern cool bar wonderful mojitos go tuesday night 2 1 price dangerous best popcorn chicken delicious

Content: We arrived at about 4pm, just as the sun was making its decent. Beach was busy, but there was plenty of room for people to move about without feeling that one was stepping on eachother's toes. Lots of activities going on along the beach from sports to family & couple gathering to impromptu food stalls and delicious sate grills. Spent about an hour there watching the sun go down and having a little paddle in the sea, before making our way back to our Villa transport that was waiting in the car park. All in all a nice break from all the shopping in Seminyak
review: arrive 4pm sun make decent busy plenty room people move without feel one step eachothers toe lots activity go along sport family couple gather impromptu food stall delicious sate grill spend hour watch sun go little paddle sea make way back villa transport wait car park nice break shopping seminyak

Content: My favourite place is here. DOuble six beach, I can do jogging, watch people play football , many tourist and local enjoy the beach. many cafes in here so no worries if we are hungry.
review: favourite place double six jogging watch people play football many tourist local enjoy many cafes worry hungry

Content: Very good spot, and eazy to access but this beach is to crowdy... You can see much better beach in bali by taking your scooter ony 15min, and if you are eazy on scooter, go to the Bukit ! Uluwatu, Dreamland, Impossible, Bingin... So much better !
review: good spot eazy access crowdy see much good bali take scooter ony 15min eazy scooter go bukit uluwatu dreamland impossible bingin much well

Content: This beach isn't wowwwwww...its always full of families, its good for those who wanna learn how to surf, or is travelling with kids. Btw i have to warn that the water is sooooo cold, and there are a lot of option for places to eat, or just chill out and enjoy the beach.
review: isnt wowwwwwwits always full family good wanna learn surf travel kid btw warn water sooooo cold lot option place eat chill enjoy

Content: Impressive waves thundering onto the beach, which makes it a gr at surf spot, also for beginners. Deckchairs under umbrellas for rent, don't pay more than 100'000 IDR per day. Only ennerving are the constant flow of sellers coming buy......

Content: Disappointed  nice location but felt food was overpriced and over cooked bacon rock hard eggs over cooked asked for soft and where hard Fresh fruit platter was tasty Felt it was a letdown considering our hotel provides a nicer breakfast included in stay
review: disappointed nice location felt food overprice cook bacon rock hard egg cook asked soft hard fresh fruit platter tasty felt letdown consider hotel provide nice breakfast include stay

Content: Sunset is so beautiful when I came. Really enjoyed watching sunset and sitting at the beach since they provide benches. However I don't really like the crowds.
review: sunset beautiful come really enjoy watch sunset sit provide bench dont really crowds

Content: Walking on this strip life is buzzing, beach live music, restaurants,with the warm temperatures life couldn't be any better

Content: if you love to get tan, well you might be like this place. perfect place to spend time with friends during sunset, surfing (and oh i saw lots of sufring class sign -if you wanna learn this thing-). or drinks at the cafe all the way down. i came here alot because i love the clean beach and it's easy to find food :)

Content: Spent a lot of time in the beach shacks on double six . These are a great place to kick back and listen to some music, beach is clean. quite enjoyable

Content: Went to see the sunset and had a drink at one of the beach bars and sat on the bean bags.. It was great seeing the waves and surfers. Then the music is blaring in all directions.. From the bars next to you as well as the one your sitting in which ruined the mood completely .. The beach isn't too clean and dirty compared to others
review: go see sunset drink one bar sit bean bag great see wave surfer music blare direction bar next well one sit ruin mood completely isnt clean dirty compare others

Content: Lovely hotel, great staff excellent restaurants.  Nothing was a trouble.  Very impressed would definitely stay here again
review: lovely hotel great staff excellent restaurant nothing trouble impress definitely stay

Content: Didnt enjoy it as much during the day. The beach is a bit dirty along the sand and the water not clear. Waves are kind of rough, perfect for surfies I guess. At night,  hubby and I spent at least 5 hrs from sunset onwards, going from beach bar to beach bar sipping on cocktails and trying tapas. Locals sell stuff to you, lanterns, bangles, glow lights, kites you name it. Not a big deal at first, but one can only buy so many bangles in one night. The one man live bands are entertaining and we fell asleep at times, not sure if from the $4 smirnoff bottles or from their singing. Still, I loved hanging out there, I think I miss that most.
review: didnt enjoy much day bite dirty along sand water clear wave kind rough perfect surfies guess night hubby spend least 5 hrs sunset onwards go bar bar sip cocktail try tapas local sell stuff lantern bangle glow light kite name big deal first one buy many bangles one night one man live band entertain fell asleep time sure 4 smirnoff bottle sing still love hang think miss

Content: Don't expect to take a rest on this beach. You will be harassed by boring people trying to sell you crappy paintings, cheap laser pointers or bad massage. They will come and try again every single minute...

Content: The most relaxing way to sit back at the end of the long day and watch the sunset. With a couple of Bintangs on the beach with the camera ready for that sunset shot.....

The sunbeds are very comfy and have nice large umbrellas with them.Without leaving our sun beds we bourght sunglasses, had delicious fruit for lunch , a welcome ice cream ( nicely frozen still ) and enjoyed a massage.Wonderful sunsets.

Content: This beach is well-known for it's food. Along the beach there are many Cafe that provide beverages with Sea and Sunset view. Really nice place to spend afternoon while watching the surfers and the view.

Content: As a guest of Double Six Hotel we could also use the deckchairs by the beach spent a couple of hours each day just sleeping and watching the views just great.
